are	O
not	O
using	O
modules	O
(	O
extension	O
.pm	O
)	O
but	O
instead	O
use	O
libraries	O
(	O
extension	O
.pl	O
)	O
:	O

Make	O
sure	O
that	O
both	O
files	O
Try_1.pl	O
and	O
Try_2.pl	O
are	O
in	O
the	O
same	O
directory	O
.	O

Should	O
I	O
use	O
ArrayList	O
,	O
Vectors	O
,	O
HashMp	O
or	O
is	O
there	O
anything	O
else	O
I	O
should	O
use	O
to	O
store	O
data	O
from	O
a	O
bank	O
program	O
I	O
am	O
working	O
on	O
.	O

I	O
am	O
trying	O
to	O
store	O
the	O
user	O
information	O
in	O
an	O
one	O
of	O
them	O
and	O
then	O
send	O
it	O
to	O
a	O
file	O
,	O
which	O
should	O
I	O
use	O
?	O

Thank	O
you	O
.	O

To	O
decide	O
between	O
using	O
an	O
ArrayList/Vector	O
or	O
a	O
HashMap	O
depends	O
on	O
whether	O
you	O
have	O
key-value	O
pairs	O
or	O
simple	O
a	O
list	B-Skill
of	O
elements	O
.	O

For	O
key-value	O
pairs	O
a	O
HashMap	O
is	O
the	O
go-to	O
option	O
(	O
e.g	O
name	O
person	O
object	O
)	O
.	O

If	O
you	O
just	O
have	O
objects	O
but	O
no	O
real	O
keys	O
(	O
a	O
list	O
of	O
trees	O
in	O
a	O
forest	O
)	O
then	O
a	O
ArrayList	O
or	O
Vector	O
would	O
be	O
better	O
.	O

The	O
difference	O
between	O
Vector	O
and	O
ArrayList	O
is	O
more	O
subtle	O
.	O

If	O
you	O
want	O
more	O
information	O
on	O
the	O
difference	O
between	O
the	O
two	O
you	O
can	O
read	O
this	O
article	O
.	O

But	O
as	O
the	O
article	O
is	O
from	O
2001	O
,	O
the	O
information	O
is	O
n't	O
the	O
newest	O
.	O

In	O
most	O
cases	O
,	O
the	O
ArrayList	O
is	O
the	O
better	O
choice	O
and	O
Vector	O
is	O
pretty	O
much	O
considered	O
deprecated	O
nowadays	O
.	O

As	O
the	O
biggest	O
difference	O
between	O
the	O
two	O
is	O
,	O
that	O
Vector	O
is	O
synchronized	O
while	O
ArrayList	O
is	O
n't	O
,	O
which	O
in	O
most	O
cases	O
,	O
makes	O
the	O
Vector	O
slower	O
than	O
the	O
ArrayList	O
as	O
it	O
creates	O
unnecessary	O
overhead	O
.	O

For	O
more	O
information	O
you	O
can	O
look	O
at	O
this	O
question	O
:	O
Why	O
is	O
Java	B-Skill
Vector	O
class	O
considered	O
obsolete	O
or	O
deprecated	O
?	O

I	O
am	O
coding	O
in	O
Qt	B-Skill
C++	B-Skill
.	O

I	O
am	O
declaring	O
a	O
literal	O
double	O
value	O
in	O
my	O
main	O
rountine	O
of	O
0.1	O
.	O

I	O
then	O
pass	O
this	O
variable	O
to	O
a	O
function	O
that	O
takes	O
type	O
double	O
.	O

When	O
I	O
hover	O
the	O
mouse	O
over	O
the	O
variable	O
in	O
debug	O
mode	O
I	O
see	O
0.100000000000001	O

What	O
is	O
the	O
cause	O
of	O
this	O
change	O
and	O
how	O
do	O
I	O
stop	O
it	O
please	O
?	O

Method	O
Definition	O
:	O

Method	O
Call	O
with	O
literal	O
value	O
of	O
0.1	O
:	O

My	O
environment	O
is	O
Windows	B-Skill
64	O
bit	O
OS	O
using	O
Qt	B-Skill
5.2.1	O
and	O
compiling	O
using	O
Microsoft	B-Skill
2010	I-Skill
Visual	I-Skill
Studio	I-Skill
compiler	I-Skill
in	O
32	O
bit	O
.	O

Many	O
decimal	O
numbers	O
are	O
not	O
exactly	O
representable	O
in	O
IEEE	O
floating	O
point	O
(	O
i.e	O
.	O
the	O
binary	O
representation	O
used	O
for	O
double	O
)	O
and	O
0.1	O
falls	O
in	O
this	O
camp	O
.	O

When	O
you	O
type	O
0.1	O
the	O
C++	B-Skill
compiler	B-Skill
is	O
required	O
to	O
convert	O
that	O
into	O
a	O
double	O
to	O
be	O
represented	O
on	O
your	O
hardware	O
.	O

It	O
does	O
so	O
by	O
computing	O
a	O
near	O
approximation	O
of	O
this	O
and	O
so	O
you	O
see	O
a	O
bit	O
of	O
error	O
.	O

If	O
you	O
try	O
something	O
like	O
a	O
power	O
of	O
two	O
:	O
0.5	O
,	O
0.25	O
these	O
will	O
be	O
exactly	O
represented	O
.	O

See	O
this	O
link	O
for	O
a	O
much	O
more	O
in-depth	O
description	O
of	O
the	O
idea	O
.	O

This	O
is	O
normal	O
behaviour	O
in	O
any	O
computer	O
.	O

It	O
's	O
caused	O
by	O
the	O
fact	O
that	O
decimal	O
numbers	O
are	O
being	O
stored	O
in	O
fixed-sized	O
binary	O
memory	O
.	O

The	O
extra	O
digits	O
come	O
from	O
the	O
inherent	O
errors	O
caused	O
by	O
converting	O
from	O
binary	O
to	O
decimal	O
.	O

You	O
will	O
not	O
get	O
rid	O
of	O
them	O
.	O

The	O
best	O
you	O
can	O
do	O
is	O
choose	O
a	O
precision	O
(	O
either	O
float	O
or	O
double	O
)	O
that	O
is	O
big	O
enough	O
so	O
that	O
the	O
extra	O
error	O
digits	O
will	O
not	O
make	O
any	O
difference	O
to	O
your	O
solution	O
,	O
and	O
then	O
chop	O
them	O
off	O
when	O
you	O
display	O
the	O
number	O
.	O

When	O
my	O
view	O
controller	O
is	O
first	O
presented	O
,	O
I	O
want	O
it	O
to	O
potentially	O
update	O
a	O
cache	O
that	O
provides	O
the	O
data	O
for	O
that	O
view	O
.	O

However	O
,	O
when	O
the	O
user	O
taps	O
the	O
back	O
button	O
from	O
a	O
deeper	O
view	O
controller	O
to	O
return	O
to	O
this	O
view	O
controller	O
,	O
I	O
do	O
n't	O
want	O
to	O
update	O
the	O
cache	O
again	O
.	O

Which	O
event	O
should	O
I	O
be	O
using	O
?	O

in	O
init	O
,	O
I	O
do	O
n't	O
have	O
all	O
the	O
parameters	O
I	O
need	O
yet	O
.	O

viewWillAppear	O
will	O
be	O
fired	O
every	O
time	O
the	O
view	O
will	O
appear	O
.	O

viewDidLoad	O
will	O
be	O
fired	O
every	O
time	O
the	O
view	O
has	O
been	O
loaded	O
from	O
the	O
nib	O
,	O
which	O
I	O
believe	O
could	O
happen	O
a	O
second	O
time	O
if	O
there	O
's	O
a	O
memory	O
warning	O
.	O

(	O
Or	O
is	O
this	O
wrong	O
?	O
)	O

Since	O
this	O
is	O
not	O
a	O
memory	O
resident	O
cache	O
,	O
it	O
seems	O
the	O
wrong	O
place	O
to	O
handle	O
this	O
.	O

having	O
the	O
caller	O
call	O
something	O
extra	O
is	O
inelegant	O
,	O
if	O
there	O
's	O
a	O
built-in	O
way	O
to	O
handle	O
this	O
.	O

To	O
clarify	O
,	O
this	O
is	O
not	O
a	O
memory	O
resident	O
cache	O
.	O

This	O
is	O
parsing	O
an	O
XML	O
file	O
to	O
binary	O
.	O

The	O
binary	O
is	O
loaded	O
and	O
unloaded	O
in	O
viewDidLoad	O
and	O
viewDidUnload	O
.	O

This	O
is	O
a	O
prerequisite	O
for	O
that	O
step	O
,	O
making	O
sure	O
the	O
binary	O
is	O
up-to-date	O
prior	O
to	O
it	O
being	O
loaded	O
.	O

load	O
the	O
cache	O
in	O
viewDidLoad	O
and	O
release	O
it	O
in	O
viewDidUnload	O
and	O
dealloc	O
.	O

viewDidUnload	O
is	O
called	O
during	O
low-memory	O
conditions	O
.	O

if	O
you	O
want	O
your	O
app	O
to	O
remain	O
responsive	O
,	O
you	O
'd	O
free	O
up	O
as	O
much	O
memory	O
as	O
you	O
can	O
.	O

well	O
explained	O
here	O
:	O
When	O
should	O
I	O
release	O
objects	O
in	O
-(void)viewDidUnload	O
rather	O
than	O
in	O
-dealloc	O
?	O

Using	O
init	O
may	O
work	O
,	O
but	O
I	O
would	O
recommend	O
a	O
simple	O
subclass	O
of	O
UINavigationController	O
.	O

Create	O
a	O
new	O
method	O
called	O
setRootTableViewController	O
:(	O
UITableViewController	O
*)	O
controller	O
,	O
or	O
something	O
like	O
it	O
.	O

In	O
the	O
method	O
implementation	O
call	O
this	O
:	O

reloadData	O
will	O
call	O
all	O
of	O
your	O
delegate	O
and	O
data	O
source	O
methods	O
,	O
and	O
use	O
them	O
to	O
update	O
the	O
table	O
.	O

If	O
you	O

special	O
method	O

on	O
your	O
table	O
view	O
controller	O
instead	O

to	O
setRootTableViewController	O
:(	O
CustomTableViewController	O
*)	O
controller	O
(	O

.	O

Then	O
,	O

,	O

of	O

to	O
add	O

.	O

However	O
,	O

,	O

:(	O

*)	O
controller	O
,	O
as	O

imagine	O
that	O
is	O
what	O

nib	O
will	O
call	O
to	O
set	O
the	O
first	O
view	O
in	O
the	O
stack	O
:	O

Hope	O
this	O
helps	O
!	O

query	O
works	O

the	O

:	O

Inside	O

:	O

Also	O

is	O
included	O

.	O

Include	O
the	O

your	O

:	O

add	O
:	O

;	O
as	O

.	O

,	O
your	O
javascript	B-Skill
is	O
not	O
included	O
properly	O
.	O

Edit	O
:	O
based	O
on	O
your	O
comments	O
again	O
.	O

If	O
you	O
have	O
multiple	O
forms	O
,	O
re-using	O
the	O
same	O
ID	O
,	O
it	O
will	O
not	O
work	O
.	O

Always	O
keep	O
IDs	O
unique	O
.	O

Since	O
your	O
link	O
is	O
inside	O
of	O
the	O
form	O
like	O
your	O
input	O
,	O
you	O
could	O
do	O
this	O
:	O

http://jsfiddle.net/376fLujs/4/	O

I	O
would	O
say	O
try	O
using	O
this	O
for	O
your	O
event	O
handling	O
:	O

The	O
reason	O
it	O
might	O
not	O
be	O
working	O
is	O
because	O
the	O
element	O
might	O
not	O
yet	O
be	O
created	O
when	O
the	O
script	O
loads	O
.	O

This	O
should	O
take	O
care	O
of	O
that	O
issue	O
.	O

I	O
'll	O
try	O
to	O
keep	O
this	O
as	O
brief	O
as	O
possible	O
.	O

I	O
have	O
GitLab	B-Skill
server	I-Skill
on	O
which	O
I	O
have	O
a	O
few	O
repositories	O
.	O

I	O
'm	O
using	O
their	O
API	B-Skill
,	O
specifically	O
Get	O
file	O
archive	O
using	O
cURL	B-Skill
and	O
PHP	B-Skill
.	O

Code	O
bellow	O
:	O

The	O
file	O
downloads	O
properly	O
and	O
is	O
saved	O
on	O
the	O
disk	O
.	O

However	O
,	O
when	O
I	O
try	O
to	O
unzip	O
it	O
MAC	B-Skill
OS	I-Skill
automatically	O
adds	O
a	O
.git	O
extension	O
.	O

If	O
I	O
manually	O
remove	O
the	O
.git	O
extension	O
it	O
will	O
be	O
properly	O
recognized	O
as	O
a	O
folder	O
and	O
everything	O
seems	O
to	O
be	O
in	O
order	O
(	O
no	O
missing	O
files	O
,	O
no	O
corrupted	O
files	O
,	O
etc	O
)	O
.	O

This	O
is	O
a	O
nuisance	O
to	O
say	O
the	O
least	O
.	O

I	O
'm	O
not	O
particularly	O
sure	O
if	O
my	O
code	O
is	O
wrong	O
,	O
or	O
there	O
's	O
something	O
wrong	O
with	O
GitLab	B-Skill
's	O

MKV	O
is	O
one	O
of	O
the	O
most	O
popular	O
video	O
container	O
format	O
which	O
supports	O
to	O
group	O
one	O
or	O
more	O
video	O
,	O
audio	O
or	O
subtitle	O
files	O
to	O
be	O
grouped	O
together	O
to	O
one	O
file	O
;	O

Now	O
a	O
days	O
majority	O
of	O
4K	O
videos	O
available	O
online	O
are	O
in	O
mkv	O
format	O
,	O

all	O

are	O
above	O
20GB	O
in	O
size	O
;	O

But	O
here	O
is	O
the	O
problem	O

majority	O
of	O
TV	O
or	O

only	O
support	O
FAT16/32	O
not	O
even	O

,	O

can	O

20	O
gb	O

and	O
having	O
metadata	O
mkv	O
(	O

in	O
the	O
below	O
example	O
)	O

will	O
able	O
to	O
pick	O
the	O
respective	O
data	O
;	O

which	O

the	O
split	O
file	O
model	O

like	O
this	O

folder/	O

main.mkv	O

part1.dat	O

part2.dat	O

part3.dat	O

As	O
the	O
creator	O
of	O
Selenium	B-Skill
RC	I-Skill
,	O
I	O
actually	O
recommend	O
against	O

Service	O
entirely	O
.	O

Instead	O
,	O
do	O
what	O
we	O
do	O
at	O
BrowserMob	B-Skill
,	O
which	O
provides	O
free	O
monitoring	O
and	O
free	O
load	O
testing	O
services	O
,	O
as	O
well	O
as	O
a	O
recently	O
launch	O
instant	O
test	O
tool	O
that	O
takes	O
screenshots	O
of	O
your	O
site	O
from	O
multiple	O
locations	O
.	O

What	O
we	O
do	O
is	O
launch	O
everything	O
from	O
under	O
the	O
context	O
of	O
a	O
VNC	B-Skill
session	O
.	O

On	O
Windows	B-Skill
,	O
configure	O
VNC	B-Skill
to	O
launch	O
a	O
session	O
upon	O
startup	O
.	O

Then	O
make	O
sure	O
the	O
user	O
auto-logs	O
in	O
.	O

Then	O
place	O
a	O
.bat	O
file	O
in	O
Program	O
Files->Startup	O
that	O
launches	O
Selenium	B-Skill
RC	I-Skill
.	O

kind	O

a	O
pain	O
,	O

it	O

the	O
most	O

that	O

,	O

IE	B-Skill
,	O

.	O

.	O

I	O

4	O

.	O

so	O
on	O
.	O

button	O

.	O

and	O

is	O

the	O
following	O
:	O

link	O

The	O
following	O
code	O
needs	O
to	O

like	O
this	O
:	O

The	O
number	O
marking	O
the	O
number	O
,	O

asterix	O

at	O

?	O

?	O

Thanks	O
.	O

Thomas	O
.	O

Waffle	B-Skill
uses	O
the	O
Windows	B-Skill
SSPI	I-Skill
,	O
which	O
performs	O
all	O
operations	O
involving	O
Kerberos	O
tickets	O
on	O
client	B-Skill
's	O
behalf	O
.	O

The	O
client	B-Skill
never	O
sees	O
the	O
ticket	O
.	O

This	O
is	O
a	O
basic	O
Kerberos	O
question	O
.	O

The	O
token	O
sent	O
to	O
the	O
server	B-Skill
is	O
encrypted	O
by	O
server	O
's	O
secret	O
key	O
,	O
which	O
guarantees	O
that	O
the	O
token	O
was	O
created	O
by	O
the	O
Ticket	B-Skill
Granting	I-Skill
Service	I-Skill
,	O
which	O
authenticated	O
the	O
client	B-Skill
.	O

Yes	O
,	O
the	O
are	O
retrieved	O
from	O
the	O
security	O
token	O
.	O

This	O
is	O
a	O
Windows-specific	B-Skill
extension	O
of	O
the	O
MIT	O
Kerberos	O
protocol	O
.	O

wanted	O

?	O

is	O

Cloudera	O
has	O
released	O
a	O
library	O
called	O
spark-ts	B-Skill
that	O
offers	O
a	O
suite	O
of	O
useful	O
methods	O
for	O
processing	O
time	O
series	O
and	O
sequential	O
data	O
in	O
Spark	B-Skill
.	O

This	O
library	O
supports	O
a	O
number	O
of	O
time-windowed	O
methods	O
for	O
imputing	O
data	O
points	O
based	O
on	O
other	O
data	O
in	O
the	O
sequence	O
.	O

http://blog.cloudera.com/blog/2015/12/spark-ts-a-new-library-for-analyzing-time-series-data-with-apache-spark/	O

inside	O
response	O
i	O
have	O
bellow	O
html	B-Skill
code	O
with	O
simple	O
JavaScript	B-Skill
function	O

here	O
,	O
this	O
popup()function	O
is	O
not	O
working	O
please	O
help	O
me	O
.	O

The	O
problem	O
is	O
you	O
expect	O
that	O
Javascript	B-Skill
contained	O
within	O
an	O

.	O

:	O

MyApp.Web	O

.	O

:	O

just	O

.	O

And	O

is	O
bound	O
and	O
everything	O
is	O
working	O
here	O
.	O

So	O
what	O
I	O
am	O
doing	O
wrong	O
here	O
?	O

Is	O
it	O
really	O
bad	O
to	O
have	O
datatable	B-Skill
in	O
UI	O
level	O
?	O

Why	O
is	O

a	O
bad	O
design	O
?	O

notion	O
that	O
it	O
is	O
bad	O

for	O
your	O
UI	O
to	O
create/load/consume	O
a	O
datatable	B-Skill
comes	O
from	O
the	O
idea	O
that	O
it	O
is	O
preferable	O
to	O
split	O
your	O
application	O
into	O
layers	O
that	O
specialize	O
,	O
the	O
most	O
common	O
split	O
is	O
to	O
have	O
3	O
layers	O
:	O

Layer	O
1	O
is	O
a	O
data	O
layer	O
responsible	O
for	O
communicating	O
with	O
the	O
database	O
and	O
populating	O
domain	O
objects	O
,	O
the	O
domain	O
objects	O
are	O
typically	O
defined	O
in	O
layer	O
2	O
which	O
also	O
holds	O
the	O
business	O
logic	O
for	O
your	O
application	O
.	O

by	O
domain	O
objects	O
i	O
mean	O
classes	O
that	O
represent	O
real	O
things	O
like	O
customer	O
,	O
bank	O
account	O
,	O
hotel	O
room	O
etc	O
.	O

and	O
by	O
business	O
logic	O
i	O
mean	O
the	O
rules	O
that	O
apply	O
to	O
domain	O
objects	O
during	O
events	O
i.e	O
.	O
when	O
a	O
hotel	O
room	O
is	O
booked	O
a	O
confirmation	O
is	O
sent	O
to	O
the	O
customer	O
.	O

the	O
third	O
layer	O
is	O
the	O
UI	O
layer	O
,	O
to	O
simplyfy	O
coding	O
this	O
should	O
only	O
deal	O
with	O
whats	O
in	O
layer	O
2	O
,	O
this	O
is	O
where	O
the	O
recommendation	O
to	O
not	O
use	O
datatables	B-Skill
in	O
your	O
UI	O
comes	O
from	O
.	O

the	O
motivation	O
to	O
split	O
your	O
application	O
really	O
start	O
to	O
make	O
sense	O
when	O
your	O
application	O
is	O
big	O
,	O
or	O
you	O
have	O
multiple	O
developers	O
working	O
on	O
it	O
,	O
or	O
your	O
using	O
unit	O
testing	O
.	O

If	O
you	O
're	O
in	O
that	O
situation	O
then	O
i	O
'd	O
try	O
and	O
find	O
a	O
friendly	O
member	O
of	O
your	O
team	O
to	O
explain	O
this	O
better	O
,	O
but	O
if	O
this	O
is	O
just	O
you	O
writing	O
an	O
application	O
on	O
your	O
own	O
then	O
i	O
would	O
n't	O
worry	O
too	O
much	O
about	O
it	O
,	O
write	O
lots	O
of	O
code	O
,	O
read	O
lots	O
of	O
books	O
and	O
this	O
stuff	O
will	O
make	O
more	O
sense	O
,	O
i	O
would	O
recommend	O
the	O
craig	O
larman	O
book	O
on	O
uml	B-Skill
and	O
patterns	O
.	O

hope	O
this	O
helps	O

I	O
am	O
using	O
asp.net	B-Skill
with	O
javascript	B-Skill
.	O

Javascript	B-Skill
work	O
fine	O
with	O
IE8	B-Skill
and	O
some	O
IE11	B-Skill
.	O

Javascript	B-Skill
is	O
able	O
to	O
response	O
for	O
some	O
user	O
who	O
use	O
IE11	B-Skill
but	O
it	O
does	O
n't	O
response	O
to	O
other	O
users	O
who	O
is	O
also	O
use	O
IE11	B-Skill
even	O
though	O
they	O
already	O
have	O
IE	B-Skill
setting	O
script	O
enabled	O
.	O

I	O
already	O
update	O
to	O
4.5	O
.NET	B-Skill
Framework	O
but	O
the	O
result	O
still	O
does	O
n't	O
work	O
.	O

One	O
of	O
users	O
told	O
me	O
that	O
the	O
web	O
used	O
to	O
work	O
well	O
before	O
while	O
he	O
using	O
IE11	B-Skill
and	O
he	O
have	O
n't	O
change	O
anything	O
since	O
until	O
web	O
does	O
n't	O
work	O
for	O
him	O
.	O

Anyone	O
know	O
what	O
could	O
cause	O
it	O
?	O

Here	O
is	O
one	O
of	O
user	O
who	O
got	O
this	O
source	O
error	O
on	O
javascript	O
file	O
,	O

I	O
found	O
the	O
solution	O
is	O
in	O
IE	B-Skill
setting	O
under	O
Security	O
tab	O
by	O
removing	O
the	O
web	O
URL	O
from	O
trusted	O
sites	O
and	O
move	O
url	O
to	O
local	O
intranet	O
.	O

I	O
have	O
a	O
UICollectionViewController	O
with	O
a	O
large	O
dataset	O
(	O
>2000	O
items	O
)	O
with	O
a	O
custom	O
layout	O
.	O

Using	O
sections	O
,	O
the	O
scrolling	O
performance	O
became	O
extremely	O
choppy	O
.	O

Using	O
Instruments	O
and	O
a	O
few	O
tests	O
,	O
I	O
determined	O
this	O
was	O
due	O
to	O
lookup	O
in	O
the	O
layout	O
(	O
layoutAttributesForElementsInRect	O
:	O
)	O
.	O

I	O
cache	O
layout	O
attributes	O
in	O
prepareLayout	O
,	O
and	O
look	O
them	O
up	O
here	O
like	O
so	O
,	O
in	O
the	O
fastest	O
way	O
I	O
know	O
of	O
:	O

I	O
found	O
that	O
~	O
25%	O
of	O
cpu	O
time	O
was	O
spent	O
enumerating	O
this	O
,	O
mostly	O
on	O
[	O
NSIndexPath	O
isEqual	O
:	O
]	O
.	O

So	O
,	O
I	O
need	O
a	O
faster	O
way	O
to	O
hash	O
these	O
values	O
.	O

It	O
must	O
be	O
possible	O
,	O
because	O
I	O
did	O
a	O
cross	O
test	O
using	O
the	O
same	O
data	O
with	O
a	O
sectioned	O
UICollectionViewFlowLayout	O
and	O
it	O
was	O
smooth	O
.	O

Well	O
,	O
turns	O
out	O
using	O
arrays	B-Skill
instead	O
of	O
dictionaries	B-Skill
,	O
and	O
filtering	O
by	O
an	O
NSPredicate	O
was	O
much	O
faster	O
since	O
in	O
this	O
case	O
the	O
indices	O
were	O
already	O
known	O
.	O

My	O
project	O
was	O
running	O
on	O
Django	B-Skill
1.5.4	O
and	O
I	O
wanted	O
to	O
upgrade	O
it	O
.	O

I	O
did	O
pip	O
install	O
-U	O
-I	O
django	O
and	O
now	O
pip	O
freeze	O
shows	O
Django	B-Skill
1.6.5	O
(	O
clearly	O
django	B-Skill
has	O
upgraded	O
,	O
I	O
'm	O
in	O
virtualen	O
v)	O
but	O
my	O
project	O
is	O
still	O
using	O
Django	B-Skill
1.5.4	O
.	O

How	O
can	O
I	O
use	O
the	O
upgraded	O
version	O
?	O

UPDATE	O
:	O
Thanks	O
for	O
your	O
comments	O
.	O

I	O
tried	O
everything	O
but	O
unfortunately	O
nothing	O
worked	O
and	O
I	O
had	O
to	O
re-deploy	O
the	O
app	O
.	O

Hope	O
someone	O
explains	O
why	O
this	O
happened	O
.	O

You	O
can	O
use	O
--upgrade	O
with	O
the	O
pip	O
command	O
to	O
upgrade	O
Python	B-Skill
packages	O
.	O

I	O
'm	O
not	O
an	O
expert	O
on	O
either	O
Python	B-Skill
or	O
Django	B-Skill
.	O

What	O
I	O
am	O
doing	O
is	O
following	O
along	O
this	O
really	O
very	O
good	O
book	O
:	O
Test	O
Driven	O
Web	O
Development	O
With	O
Python	B-Skill
(	O
2nd	O
Ed	O
)	O
.	O

It	O
uses	O
Django	B-Skill
..	O
.	O

I	O
'm	O
also	O
using	O
a	O
Windoze	B-Skill
machine	O
(	O
W10	B-Skill
)	O
with	O
Cygwin	B-Skill
.	O

The	O
reason	O
I	O
mention	O
all	O
this	O
is	O
because	O
I	O
found	O
,	O
having	O
installed	O
Python	B-Skill
3.6	O
in	O
my	O
Cygwin	B-Skill
setup	O
,	O
that	O
I	O
had	O
to	O
use	O
pip3	O
,	O
not	O
pip	O
,	O
to	O
install	O
Django	B-Skill
.	O

My	O
installed	O
version	O
of	O
Django	B-Skill
was	O
1.11.8	O
.	O

To	O
follow	O
the	O
"	O
official	O
"	O
(?)	O

tutorial	O
here	O
they	O
want	O
you	O
to	O
have	O
Django	B-Skill
2.0	O
installed	O
.	O

I	O
successfully	O
managed	O
to	O
do	O
this	O
with	O
:	O

Hope	O
this	O
helps	O
someone	O
.	O

Perhaps	O
someone	O
much	O
more	O
knowledgeable	O
than	O
me	O
can	O
talk	O
about	O
the	O
need	O
or	O
otherwise	O
to	O
use	O
pip3	O
for	O
all	O
Python	B-Skill
3.x	O
activity	O
??	O
?	O

I	O
have	O
an	O
existing	O
java	B-Skill
based	O
rate	O
streaming	O
application	O
deployed	O
in	O
weblogic	B-Skill
,	O
i	O
need	O
to	O
use	O
node	B-Skill
js	I-Skill
and	O
redis	B-Skill
for	O
real-time	O
streaming	O
rates	O
.	O

How	O
can	O
i	O
use	O
node	B-Skill
js	I-Skill
and	O
redis	B-Skill
to	O
my	O
existing	O
java	B-Skill
based	O
application	O
deployed	O
in	O
weblogic	B-Skill
.	O

I	O
'm	O
writing	O
some	O
software	O
that	O
talks	O
to	O
external	O
hardware	O
via	O
a	O
dll	B-Skill
(	O
moving	O
some	O
motors	O
and	O
reading	O
some	O
values	O
back	O
)	O
.	O

The	O
calls	O
to	O
the	O
dll	B-Skill
are	O
blocking	O
and	O
may	O
not	O
return	O
for	O
in	O
the	O
order	O
of	O
10	O
seconds	O
.	O

The	O
software	O
performs	O
a	O
scan	O
by	O
moving	O
the	O
hardware	O
,	O
taking	O
a	O
reading	O
and	O
repeating	O
for	O
a	O
number	O
of	O
points	O
.	O

One	O
scan	O
can	O
take	O
in	O
the	O
order	O
of	O
30	O
minutes	O
to	O
complete	O
.	O

While	O
the	O
scan	O
is	O
running	O
I	O
would	O
obviously	O
like	O
the	O
GUI	O
to	O
be	O
responsive	O
and	O
a	O
live	O
graph	B-Skill
(	O
in	O
an	O
MDI	O
Child	O
)	O
of	O
the	O
incoming	O
data	O
to	O
be	O
updated	O
at	O
each	O
point	O
.	O

Multithreading	O
seems	O
the	O
obvious	O
choice	O
for	O
this	O
problem	O
.	O

My	O
question	O
is	O
,	O
what	O
is	O
the	O
best	O
way	O
to	O
thread	O
this	O
and	O
talk	O
back	O
to	O
the	O
main	O
VCL	B-Skill
thread	O
to	O
update	O
the	O
graph	B-Skill
during	O
a	O
scan	O
?	O

I	O
currently	O
have	O
a	O
single	O
TThread	O
descendant	O
that	O
performs	O
the	O
'	O
scan	O
logic	O
'	O
and	O
an	O
array	B-Skill
of	O
doubles	O
in	O
the	O
public	O
var	O
section	O
of	O
the	O
ChildForm	O
.	O

I	O
need	O
to	O
fill	O
out	O
this	O
array	B-Skill
from	O
the	O
thread	O
but	O
I	O
do	O
n't	O
know	O
whether	O
to	O
use	O
Synchronize	O
or	O
CriticalSection	O
or	O
PostMessage	O
or	O
some	O
other	O
method	O
.	O

Each	O
time	O
a	O
new	O
value	O
is	O
added	O
,	O
the	O
main	O
VCL	B-Skill
thread	O
needs	O
to	O
update	O
the	O
graph	B-Skill
.	O

Should	O
I	O
really	O
have	O
an	O
intermediary	O
object	O
for	O
the	O
data	O
that	O
is	O
a	O
global	O
var	O
and	O
access	O
this	O
from	O
the	O
Thread	O
and	O
the	O
ChildForm	O
separately	O
somehow	O
?	O

I	O
find	O
that	O
populating	O
a	O
TThreadList	O
from	O
the	O
background	O
thread	O
,	O
then	O
posting	O
a	O
message	O
to	O
the	O
main	O
thread	O
that	O
there	O
is	O
a	O
new	O
item	O
in	O
the	O
list	B-Skill
,	O
then	O
processing	O
the	O
list	B-Skill
in	O
the	O
main	O
thread	O
is	O
simple	O
and	O
easily	O
maintainable	O
.	O

With	O
this	O
method	O
,	O
you	O
could	O
store	O
as	O
many	O
readings	O
as	O
you	O
wanted	O
in	O
the	O
list	B-Skill
,	O
and	O
every	O
time	O
the	O
main	O
thread	O
received	O
a	O
message	O
,	O
it	O
would	O
simply	O
process	O
all	O
the	O
items	O
in	O
the	O
list	B-Skill
at	O
once	O
.	O

Define	O
a	O
class	O
for	O
the	O
readings	O
,	O
instantiate	O
them	O
,	O
and	O
add	O
them	O
to	O
the	O
list	B-Skill
in	O
the	O
background	O
thread	O
.	O

Do	O
n't	O
forget	O
to	O
free	O
them	O
in	O
the	O
main	O
thread	O
when	O
you	O
pop	O
them	O
off	O
the	O
list	B-Skill
.	O

If	O
you	O
want	O
to	O
invest	O
a	O
little	O
more	O
then	O
a	O
simple	O
Synchronize	O
call	O
which	O
by	O
the	O
way	O
blocks	O
the	O
main	O
thread	O
,	O
you	O
can	O
add	O
a	O
simple	O
FIFO	O
queue	B-Skill
with	O
messaging	O
on	O
top	O
of	O
it	O
.	O

The	O
flow	O
of	O
data	O
would	O
be	O
like	O
this	O
:	O

The	O
thread	O
puts	O
the	O
data	O
into	O
the	O
queue	B-Skill
.	O

The	O
thread	O
post	O
a	O
message	O
to	O
the	O
main	O
thread	O
window	O
.	O

Which	O
one	O
I	O
do	O
n't	O
care	O
:)	O

You	O
handle	O
the	O
message	O
that	O
data	O
is	O
available	O
and	O
process	O
any	O
messages	O
in	O
the	O
queue	B-Skill
as	O
you	O
see	O
fit	O
.	O

The	O
code	O
would	O
look	O
something	O
like	O
this	O
:	O

the	O
queue	B-Skill
..	O
.	O

the	O
data	O
is	O
put	O
into	O
the	O
queue	B-Skill
..	O
.	O

and	O
processing	O
..	O
.	O

The	O
code	O
is	O
written	O
without	O
Delphi	B-Skill
and	O
checks	O
so	O
it	O
can	O
contain	O
errors	O
.	O

I	O
showed	O
the	O
example	O
using	O
my	O
freely	O
available	O
thread	O
safe	O
queue	B-Skill
and	O
TAnyValue	O
.	O

You	O
can	O
find	O
both	O
here	O
:	O

http://www.cromis.net/blog/downloads/	O

Also	O
please	O
note	O
then	O
I	O
did	O
not	O
do	O
any	O
check	O
if	O
PostMessage	O
was	O
actually	O
sent	O
.	O

You	O
should	O
check	O
that	O
in	O
production	O
code	O
.	O

I	O
am	O
creating	O
a	O
app	O
whereby	O
the	O
user	O
inputs	O
data	O
into	O
a	O
form	O
and	O
then	O
hits	O
the	O
button	O
,	O
opens	O
up	O
a	O
emailing	O
app	O
and	O
sends	O
it	O
off	O
to	O
the	O
email	O
address	O
put	O
in	O
.	O

I	O
have	O
3	O
checkboxes	O
,	O
one	O
that	O
asks	O
if	O
the	O
user	O
wants	O
a	O
call	O
back	O
,	O
one	O
if	O
they	O
want	O
an	O
email	O
back	O
and	O
one	O
saying	O
no	O
thanks	O
to	O
both	O
.	O

My	O
current	O
java	B-Skill
code	O
is	O
:	O

And	O
then	O
the	O
method	O
which	O
calls	O
all	O
the	O
above	O
is	O
:	O

On	O
the	O
last	O
line	O
,	O
I	O
want	O
to	O
get	O
the	O
data	O
from	O
the	O
checkbox	O
for	O
example	O
,	O
if	O
the	O
call	O
back	O
box	O
was	O
ticked	O
,	O
in	O
the	O
email	O
it	O
should	O
say	O
"	O
The	O
user	O
requests	O
a	O
call	O
back	O
"	O
.	O

If	O
both	O
call	O
and	O
email	O
are	O
ticked	O
then	O
"	O
The	O
user	O
requests	O
a	O
call	O
or	O
email	O
back	O
"	O
and	O
if	O
the	O
no	O
thanks	O
checkbox	O
is	O
ticked	O
then	O
"	O
The	O
user	O
does	O
n't	O
require	O
an	O
update	O
when	O
issue	O
is	O
resolved	O
"	O
.	O

I	O
am	O
trying	O
to	O
create	O
a	O
dataset	O
pattern	O
like	O
this	O
from	O
the	O
rest	B-Skill
service	O
in	O
my	O
angular	B-Skill
application	O
.	O

Example	O
:	O

Right	O
now	O
this	O
is	O
my	O
code	O
to	O
build	O
a	O
similar	O
pattern	O
,	O

Problem	O
is	O
data	O
field	O
is	O
not	O
creating	O
an	O
array	B-Skill
.	O

This	O
is	O
the	O
final	O
output	O
which	O
the	O
above	O
code	O
generates	O
.	O

try	O
this	O
,	O
You	O
nee	O
a	O
loop	O
for	O
dataname	O

push()	O
returns	O
the	O
new	O
array	B-Skill
's	O
length	O

or	O
you	O
can	O
use	O
concat()	O

SOLUTION	O

Well	O
,	O
that	O
's	O
what	O
I	O
get	O
when	O
I	O
use	O
a	O
bit	O
oldish	O
Symfony2	B-Skill
release	O
(	O
2.0-RC6	O
)	O
.	O

It	O
seems	O
that	O
there	O
was	O
a	O
bug	O
in	O
__construct	O
of	O
RoleSecurityIdentity	O
(	O
reported	O
back	O
in	O
December	O
'	O
10	O
)	O
.	O

Instead	O
of	O
instance	O
of	O
Role	O
it	O
should	O
be	O
instance	O
of	O
RoleInstance	O
.	O

I	O
should	O
probably	O
close	O
this	O
question	O
..	O
.	O

I	O
'm	O
pretty	O
new	O
to	O
whole	O
ACL	B-Skill
concept	O
in	O
Symfony2	B-Skill
but	O
I	O
understand	O
basics	O
behind	O
it	O
.	O

Last	O
night	O
I	O
was	O
trying	O
to	O
make	O
next	O
scenario	O
work	O
:	O

I	O
have	O
2	O
user	O
roles	O
(	O
ROLE_GROUP1	O
,	O
ROLE_GROUP	O
2)	O
and	O
I	O
want	O
to	O
setup	O
object-level	O

for	O
the	O
one	O
of	O
these	O
groups	O
.	O

If	O
user	O
with	O
ROLE_GROUP1	O
is	O
logged	O
in	O
it	O
should	O
put	O
this	O
role	O
into	O
ACE	O
,	O
otherwise	O
it	O
should	O
put	O
ROLE_GROUP2	O
.	O

So	O
far	O
I	O
wrote	O
this	O
code	O
(	O
really	O
almost	O
identical	O
to	O
official	O
docs	O
)	O
:	O

The	O
way	O
I	O
understand	O

,	O
this	O
should	O
grant	O
all	O
permissions	O
to	O
users	O
with	O
ROLE_GROUP1	O

.	O

Am	O
I	O
wrong	O
?	O

To	O
check	O
for	O
permissions	O
I	O
used	O
this	O
code	O
(	O
again	O
,	O
from	O
official	O
docs	O
)	O
:	O

..	O
.	O
but	O
it	O
always	O
fails	O
(	O
that	O
is	O
throws	O
an	O
exception	O
)	O
.	O

I	O
looked	O
into	O
the	O
ACL	B-Skill
tables	I-Skill
and	O
everything	O
seemed	O
normal	O
,	O
as	O
far	O
as	O
I	O
could	O
see	O
.	O

Am	O
I	O
doing	O
something	O
wrong	O
with	O
RoleSecurityIdentity	O
?	O

Is	O
there	O
any	O
way	O
to	O
achieve	O
this	O
scenario	O
?	O

Any	O
help	O
would	O
be	O
much	O
appreciated	O
!	O

EDIT	O

I	O
just	O
drilled	O
down	O
through	O
the	O
Symfony	B-Skill
's	O
code	O
and	O
found	O
out	O
that	O
permission	O
grant	O
fails	O
in	O
equals	O
method	O
of	O
RoleSecurityIdentity	O
.	O

It	O
turns	O
out	O
that	O
$sid->getRole()	O
is	O
string	O
"	O
ROLE_GROUP1	O
"	O
while	O
$	O
this->role	O
is	O
Role	O
object	O
of	O
ROLE_GROUP1	O
role	O
.	O

Just	O
to	O
mark	O
this	O
question	O
as	O
resolved	O
.	O

Solution	O
:	O

Well	O
,	O
that	O
's	O
what	O
I	O
get	O
when	O
I	O
use	O
a	O
bit	O
oldish	O
Symfony2	B-Skill
release	O
(	O
2.0-RC6	O
)	O
.	O

It	O
seems	O
that	O
there	O
was	O
a	O
bug	O
in	O
__construct	O
of	O
RoleSecurityIdentity	O
(	O
reported	O
back	O
in	O
December	O
'	O
10	O
)	O
.	O

Instead	O
of	O
instance	O
of	O
Role	O
it	O
should	O
be	O
instance	O
of	O
RoleInstance	O
.	O

I	O
should	O
probably	O
close	O
this	O
question	O
..	O
.	O

I	O
have	O
two	O
tables	O
as	O
follows	O
:	O

The	O
two	O
tables	B-Skill
are	O
related	O
through	O
Foreign-key	O
:	O
FkOriginalTextId	O

Basically	O
,	O
OriginalText	O
will	O
have	O
key/value	O
pairs	O
for	O
different	O
languages	O
.	O

If	O
a	O
particular	O
client	B-Skill
wants	O
a	O
certain	O
value	O
to	O
be	O
customized	O
then	O
it	O
goes	O
to	O
the	O
CustomText	O
table	B-Skill
.	O

An	O
example	O
would	O
be	O
OriginalText	O
:	O
Employee	O
,	O
CustomText	O
:	O
Staff-member	O
for	O
the	O
key	O
:	O
Employee	O
.	O

I	O
want	O
to	O
write	O
a	O
Lambda/Linq	B-Skill
to	O
get	O
all	O
the	O
text	O
of	O
a	O
given	O
language	O
from	O
the	O
OriginalText	O
table	B-Skill
,	O
but	O
the	O
TextValue	O
should	O
be	O
overriden	O
if	O
there	O
's	O
a	O
custom	O
replacement	O
for	O
that	O
key	O
in	O
the	O
CustomText	O
table	B-Skill
.	O

I	O
can	O
do	O
this	O
using	O
multiple	O
SQL	B-Skill
statements	O
by	O
getting	O
the	O
OriginalText	O
values	O
to	O
a	O
temp	O
table	B-Skill
and	O
later	O
on	O
updating	O
them	O
with	O
CustomText	O
value	O
,	O
but	O
is	O
there	O
's	O
a	O
better	O
way	O
to	O
do	O
that	O
?	O

Perhaps	O
using	O
a	O
CTE	O
?	O

P.S	O
.	O
I	O
want	O
to	O
do	O
this	O
using	O
LINQ	B-Skill
or	O
Lambda	B-Skill
expressions	O

As	O
two	O
tables	B-Skill
have	O
relations	O
so	O
,	O
you	O
can	O
easily	O
check	O
if	O
each	O
OriginalText	O
item	O
has	O
a	O
CustomText	O
or	O
not	O
.	O

and	O
get	O
value	O
from	O
CustomText	O
if	O
exists	O
:	O

I	O
have	O
just	O
normalized	O
the	O
font	O
size	O
with	O
this	O
:	O

Now	O
I	O
would	O
like	O
to	O
resize	O
the	O
heading	O
tags	O
giving	O
percentages	O
to	O
the	O
<h1>,	O
<h2>	O
.	O

Something	O
like	O
this	O
:	O

As	O
you	O
can	O
see	O
,	O
I	O
gave	O
a	O
percentage	O
to	O
the	O
h2	O
,	O
but	O
what	O
are	O
the	O
percentages	O
for	O
the	O
rest	O
of	O
them	O
?	O

The	O
percentages	O
can	O
be	O
whatever	O
you	O
want	O
them	O
to	O
be	O
.	O

There	O
's	O
nothing	O
saying	O
that	O
an	O
H1	O
has	O
to	O
be	O
bigger	O
than	O
an	O
H2	O
,	O
that	O
's	O
just	O
the	O
default	O
.	O

View	O
the	O
falowing	O
link	O
,	O
it	O
might	O
help	O
you	O
solve	O
that	O
:	O

CSS	B-Skill
FONT	O
SIZE	O
em	O
vs	O
px	O
vs	O
pt	O
vs	O
%	O

I	O
found	O
this	O
link	O
with	O
a	O
conversion	O
table	O
.	O

I	O
am	O
trying	O
to	O
assign	O
click	O
event	O
to	O
a	O
button	O
using	O
live	O
and	O
want	O
the	O
user	O
can	O
only	O
trigger	O
it	O
only	O
once	O
.	O

Are	O
there	O
anyways	O
to	O
do	O
it	O
?	O

Please	O
note	O
:	O
The	O
button	O
is	O
created	O
dynamically	O
.	O

You	O
can	O
use	O
one()	O
with	O
delegated	O
handlers	O
as	O
well	O
(	O
in	O
jQuery	B-Skill
1.7	O
+	O
)	O
and	O
replace	O
the	O
deprecated	O
live()	O
function	O
with	O
something	O
like	O
this	O
:	O

replace	O
document	O
with	O
the	O
closest	O
non-dynamic	O
parent	O
.	O

The	O
best	O
option	O
is	O
to	O
use	O
.one	O
instead	O
of	O
live	O
for	O
the	O
button	O
.	O

That	O
makes	O
more	O
sense.	O
.	O

If	O
you	O
do	O
not	O
want	O
to	O
use	O
it	O
then	O
you	O
can	O
use	O
a	O
Hiddenfield	O
in	O
your	O
page	O
and	O
when	O
the	O
click	O
event	O
is	O
triggered	O
then	O
set	O
the	O
flag	O
value.	O
.	O

Next	O
time	O
when	O
you	O
click	O
the	O
button	O
check	O
for	O
the	O
flag	O
value	O
,	O
if	O
it	O
was	O
already	O
executed	O
once	O
then	O
do	O
not	O
run	O
the	O
code	O
inside	O
it.	O
.	O

Check	O
this	O
example	O
http://jsfiddle.net/sushanth009/Fakb5/	O

Also	O
note	O
that	O
.live	O
is	O
deprecated	O
in	O
the	O
current	O
jQuery	B-Skill
version	O
.	O

It	O
is	O
preferred	O
to	O
use	O
.on()	O
instead	O

Why	O
am	O
I	O
getting	O
this	O
error	O
?	O

Here	O
's	O
the	O
code	O
.	O

I	O
think	O
it	O
looks	O
fine	O
,	O
but	O
I	O
may	O
have	O
some	O
pretty	O
bad	O
mistakes	O
.	O

sorry	O
for	O
the	O
dumb	O
question	O
:	O

I	O
am	O
trying	O
to	O
do	O
arrays	B-Skill
which	O
are	O
lists	B-Skill
in	O
python	B-Skill
(	O
for	O
the	O
first	O
time	O
)	O
,	O
and	O
I	O
am	O
also	O
new	O
to	O
coding	O
and	O
python	B-Skill
.	O

Here	O
:	O

You	O
assign	O
playerHand	O
the	O
return	O
from	O
randint	O
,	O
which	O
is	O
an	O
int	O
.	O

Then	O
here	O
:	O

You	O
attempt	O
to	O
index	O
into	O
playerHand	O
like	O
it	O
is	O
an	O
array	B-Skill
.	O

Hence	O
the	O
error	O
.	O

You	O
need	O
make	O
a	O
list	B-Skill
.	O

The	O
wrong	O
version	O
:	O

The	O
correct	O
version	O
:	O

So	O
confusingly	O
@IfProfileValue	O
has	O
nothing	O
to	O
do	O
with	O
@Profile	O
or	O
@ActiveProfiles	O
.	O

@Profile	O
tests	O
to	O
see	O
if	O
a	O
profile	O
is	O
active	O
,	O
@ActiveProfiles	O
sets	O
them	O
as	O
active	O
,	O
and	O
@IfProfileValue	O
allows	O
you	O
to	O
check	O
things	O
in	O
Spring	B-Skill
Environment	O
.	O

Wut	O
?	O

I	O
'd	O
deprecate	O
all	O
of	O
them	O
and	O
add	O
new	O
ones	O
@IfEnvironment	O
,	O
@IfProfile	O
,	O
and	O
@ActivateProfiles	O
.	O

Commentary	O
aside	O
,	O
how	O
can	O
I	O
use	O
@IfProfileValue	O
to	O
detect	O
whether	O
i	O
have	O
a	O
profile	O
active	O
?	O

I	O
am	O
not	O
using	O
Spring	B-Skill
Boot	I-Skill
on	O
this	O
project	O
,	O
at	O
this	O
time	O
.	O

Answers	O
should	O
show	O
code	O
,	O
and	O
we	O
will	O
assume	O
that	O
I	O
want	O
the	O
test	O
to	O
run	O
if	O
the	O
profile	O
is	O
activated	O
as	O
@ActiveProfiles	O
(	O
"	O
test	O
"	O
)	O
.	O

I	O
tried	O
@IfProfileValue	O
(	O
name	O
=	O
"	O
activeProfiles	O
"	O
,	O
value	O
=	O
"	O
test	O
"	O
)	O
but	O
that	O
seems	O
to	O
have	O
the	O
test	O
skipped	O
,	O
which	O
means	O
it	O
's	O
not	O
matching	O
.	O

I	O
'm	O
going	O
to	O
speculate	O
the	O
problem	O
may	O
have	O
to	O
do	O
with	O
the	O
fact	O
that	O
ActiveProfiles	O
is	O
a	O
Collection	O
.	O

That	O
's	O
correct	O
,	O
and	O
I	O
explained	O
this	O
in	O
detail	O
here	O
:	O
https://stackoverflow.com/a/23627479/388980	O

..	O
.	O
which	O
I	O
'm	O
assuming	O
you	O
have	O
already	O
seen	O
,	O
since	O
you	O
commented	O
on	O
my	O
answer	O
yesterday	O
.	O

The	O
reason	O
that	O
@IfProfileValue	O
has	O
nothing	O
to	O
do	O
with	O
@Profile	O
or	O
@ActiveProfiles	O
is	O
due	O
to	O
the	O
evolution	O
of	O
the	O
framework	O
.	O

See	O
below	O
for	O
further	O
details	O
.	O

These	O
statements	O
are	O
not	O
entirely	O
correct	O
,	O
especially	O
the	O
last	O
part	O
.	O

@Profile	O
is	O
used	O
to	O
selectively	O
enable	O
a	O
component	O
(	O
e.g	O
.	O
,	O
@Service	O
,	O
etc	O
.	O
)	O
,	O
@Configuration	O
class	O
,	O
or	O
@Bean	O
method	O
if	O
one	O
of	O
the	O
named	O
bean	O
definition	O
profiles	O
is	O
active	O
in	O
the	O
Spring	O
Environment	O
for	O
the	O
ApplicationContext	O
.	O

This	O
annotation	O
is	O
not	O
directly	O
related	O
to	O
testing	O
:	O
@Profile	O
should	O
not	O
be	O
used	O
on	O
a	O
test	O
class	O
.	O

@ActiveProfiles	O
is	O
used	O
to	O
designate	O
which	O
bean	O
definition	O
profiles	O
(	O
e.g	O
.	O
,	O
those	O
declared	O
via	O
@Profile	O
)	O
should	O
be	O
active	O
when	O
loading	O
an	O
ApplicationContext	O
for	O
an	O
integration	O
test	O
.	O

@IfProfileValue	O
does	O
not	O
allow	O
you	O
to	O
check	O
things	O
in	O
the	O
Spring	O
Environment	O
.	O

I	O
'm	O
not	O
sure	O
why	O
you	O
are	O
assuming	O
this	O
,	O
since	O
none	O
of	O
the	O
documentation	O
in	O
the	O
Spring	B-Skill
Framework	I-Skill
states	O
that	O
.	O

As	O
I	O
stated	O
in	O
the	O
aforementioned	O
thread	O
:	O

Please	O
note	O
that	O
@IfProfileValue	O
was	O
introduced	O
in	O
Spring	B-Skill
Framework	I-Skill
2.0	O
,	O
long	O
before	O
the	O
notion	O
of	O
bean	O
definition	O
profiles	O
,	O
and	O
@ActiveProfiles	O
was	O
first	O
introduced	O
in	O
Spring	B-Skill
Framework	I-Skill
3.1	O
.	O

In	O
the	O
aforementioned	O
thread	O
,	O
I	O
also	O
pointed	O
out	O
the	O
following	O
:	O

The	O
term	O
'	O
profile	O
'	O
is	O
perhaps	O
misleading	O
when	O
considering	O
the	O
semantics	O
for	O
@IfProfileValue	O
.	O

The	O
key	O
is	O
to	O
think	O
about	O
'	O
test	O
groups	O
'	O
(	O
like	O
those	O
in	O
TestNG	B-Skill
)	O
instead	O
of	O
'	O
profiles	O
'	O
.	O

See	O
the	O
examples	O
in	O
the	O
JavaDoc	O
for	O
@IfProfileValue	O
.	O

That	O
depends	O
,	O
and	O
..	O
.	O

I	O
'm	O
assuming	O
you	O
mean	O
bean	O
definition	O
profile	O
when	O
you	O
say	O
"	O
profile	O
"	O
.	O

If	O
you	O
're	O
using	O
@ActiveProfiles	O
to	O
set	O
the	O
bean	O
definition	O
profiles	O
for	O
your	O
tests	O
,	O
you	O
cannot	O
currently	O
use	O
@IfProfileValue	O
to	O
determine	O
if	O
a	O
bean	O
definition	O
profile	O
is	O
active	O
,	O
since	O
the	O
bean	O
definition	O
profiles	O
configured	O
via	O
@ActiveProfiles	O
are	O
set	O
directly	O
in	O
the	O
test	O
's	O
ApplicationContext	O
and	O
not	O
as	O
a	O
Java	B-Skill
system	O
property	O
.	O

However	O
,	O
if	O
you	O
are	O
setting	O
the	O
bean	O
definition	O
profiles	O
only	O
via	O
the	O
spring.profiles.active	O
system	O
property	O
,	O
then	O
it	O
would	O
be	O
possible	O
to	O
use	O
@IfProfileValue	O
to	O
determine	O
if	O
a	O
bean	O
definition	O
profile	O
is	O
active	O
,	O
since	O
@IfProfileValue	O
in	O
fact	O
works	O
with	O
system	O
properties	O
.	O

For	O
example	O
,	O
you	O
could	O
then	O
use	O
the	O
following	O
:	O

That	O
wo	O
n't	O
work	O
since	O
activeProfiles	O
is	O
the	O
incorrect	O
property	O
name	O
.	O

The	O
correct	O
system	O
property	O
name	O
is	O
spring.profiles.active	O
.	O

See	O
AbstractEnvironment.ACTIVE_PROFILES_PROPERTY_NAME	O
for	O
details	O
.	O

The	O
fact	O
that	O
@IfProfileValue	O
does	O
not	O
work	O
in	O
harmony	O
with	O
@ActiveProfiles	O
is	O
a	O
known	O
issue	O
to	O
the	O
Spring	B-Skill
team	O
.	O

Please	O
consult	O
the	O
following	O
JIRA	B-Skill
issues	O
for	O
further	O
details	O
and	O
to	O
join	O
in	O
on	O
the	O
discussions	O
if	O
you	O
'd	O
like	O
.	O

https://jira.spring.io/browse/SPR-7754	O

https://jira.spring.io/browse/SPR-8982	O

https://jira.spring.io/browse/SPR-11677	O

Hope	O
this	O
clarifies	O
the	O
situation	O
for	O
you	O
!	O

these	O

:	O

How	O

?	O

values	O

.	O

**	O

something	O
else	O

I	O
found	O
a	O
simple	O
solution	O
after	O
several	O
tests	O
:	O

array_slice	O

Since	O
your	O
array	B-Skill
contains	O
mixed	O
keys	O

should	O
first	O
sort	O
it	O
so	O

would	O
appear	O
first	O
.	O

According	O
to	O
your	O
code	O
:	O

Output	O
:	O

Manual	O
array_slice	O

Manual	O
ksort	O

assume	O
I	O
have	O
a	O
dataset	B-Skill
:	O

And	O
I	O
want	O
sql	B-Skill
to	O
generate	O
the	O
following	O
datasource	O
based	O
on	O
the	O
dateStart	O
and	O
the	O
dateEnd	O
.	O

Note	O
the	O
year	O
and	O
month	O
grouping	O
.	O

I	O
'm	O
having	O
a	O
hard	O
time	O
wrapping	O
my	O
head	O
around	O
this	O
one	O
.	O

Any	O

?	O

First	O

create	O
a	O

function	O
that	O
takes	O

and	O

:	O

an	O
example	O
the	O
following	O
:	O

returns	O
:	O

would	O
join	O
to	O

like	O
this	O
to	O
get	O
what	O

wanted	O
:	O

I	O
find	O

a	O

of	O

.	O

is	O

:	O

A	O

suite	O
is	O
using	O

is	O

sbt	B-Skill
command	O

?	O

I	O
have	O
tried	O

Also	O
:	O

Finally	O
:	O

any	O

those	O
attempts	O
the	O

comes	O
up	O

.	O

An	O

that	O
does	O
work	O
is	O
running	O

from	O
within	O

=	O
foo	O
within	O

.	O

This	O
worked	O
for	O
me	O
:	O

and	O
:	O

Your	O
third	O
way	O
almost	O
works	O
(	O
if	O
fork	O
in	O
Test	O
:=	O
true	O
is	O
set	O
)	O
.	O

But	O
you	O
have	O
to	O
change	O
into	O
the	O
project	O
first	O
:	O

I	O
have	O
created	O
a	O
Dynamic	O
Url	O
with	O
optional	O
parameter	O

e.g	O
.	O
,	O
If	O
my	O
url	O
is	O
as	O
www.example.com/getTest/1/	O

Now	O
this	O
1	O
in	O
url	O
is	O
optional	O
,	O
to	O
handle	O
this	O
in	O
views	O
I	O
have	O
used	O
None	O
like	O

Thus	O
if	O
there	O
is	O
no	O
id	O
in	O
URL	O
then	O
still	O
the	O
function	O
works	O
for	O
me	O
.	O

But	O
I	O
am	O
facing	O
issue	O
while	O
testing	O
this	O
in	O
unit	O
cases	O
.	O

if	O
I	O
use	O
url	O
as	O
url	O
=	O
reverse	O
(	O
'yescourse:academypage_url'	O
,	O
args	O
=[	O
None]	O
)	O
it	O
gives	O
me	O
the	O
error	O

NoReverseMatch	O
:	O
Reverse	O
for	O
'	O
academypage_url	O
'	O
with	O
arguments	O
'	O
(	O
'	O
new	O
'	O
,	O
None	O
)	O
'	O
and	O
keyword	O
arguments	O
'{}'	O
not	O
found	O
.	O

So	O
Please	O
Tell	O
me	O
how	O
I	O
can	O
handle	O
these	O
optional	O
url	O
in	O
Test	O
cases	O
or	O
in	O
Reverse	O
.	O

Edit	O
:	O

You	O
made	O
the	O
view	O
function	O
's	O
id	O
parameter	O
optional	O
,	O
but	O
it	O
's	O
not	O
optional	O
in	O
the	O
url	O
pattern	O
.	O

You	O
firsty	O
need	O
to	O
rewrite	O
your	O
pattern	O
as	O
:	O

=>	O
the	O
whole	O
'	O
id	O
'	O
sub-pattern	O
is	O
optional	O
,	O
but	O
if	O
it	O
's	O
not	O
it	O
must	O
match	O
one	O
or	O
more	O
numerics	O
.	O

Once	O
done	O
,	O
you	O
can	O
reverse	O
the	O
url	O
by	O
not	O
passing	O
any	O
of	O
the	O
args	O
nor	O
kwargs	O
arguments	O
:	O

or	O
by	O
passing	O
an	O
empty	O
list	B-Skill

or	O
by	O
passing	O
None	O

but	O
not	O
by	O
passing	O
a	O
list	B-Skill
containing	O
None	O
.	O

I	O
have	O
a	O
controller	O
"	O
front	O
"	O
and	O
I	O
want	O
only	O
for	O
this	O
controller	O
to	O
use	O
a	O
custom	O
error	O
action	O
.	O

How	O
can	O
I	O
do	O
this	O
?	O

I	O
tried	O
this	O
but	O
it	O
does	O
not	O
seems	O
to	O
work	O

I	O
found	O
this	O
solution	O
to	O
catch	O
the	O
Exception	O

All	O
http	O
security	O
is	O
applied	O
at	O
startup	O
:	O

During	O
runtime	O
,	O
I	O
am	O

Firstly	O
,	O
I	O
know	O
LocationManager	O
does	O

have	O
to	O
be	O
called	O
in	O
an	O

as	O
it	O
's	O
already	O
non	O
UI	O
blocking	O
:)	O

I	O
have	O
an	O
activity	O
which	O

1	O
.	O
Gets	O
the	O
users	O
current	O
location	O

2	O
.	O
Calls	O
a	O
webservice	O
to	O
retrieve	O
a	O
list	O
of	O
specific	O
POIs	O
around	O
that	O
location	O
.	O

The	O
user	O
can	O
choose	O
to	O
view	O
the	O
results	O
as	O
map	B-Skill
or	O
list	B-Skill
using	O
a	O
TabActivity	O
.	O

Bearing	O
this	O
in	O
mind	O
the	O
AsyncTask	O
to	O
get	O
users	O
location	O
and	O
call	O
to	O
webservice	O
is	O
managed	O
by	O
the	O
TabActivity	O
view	O
rather	O
than	O
either	O
of	O
the	O
docked	O
views	O
.	O

So	O
I	O
want	O
the	O
TabActivity	O
to	O
start	O
an	O
AsyncTask	O
which	O
first	O
gets	O
the	O
users	O
location	O
,	O
then	O
calls	O
the	O
webservice	O
.	O

A	O
progress	O
dialog	O
prevents	O
switching	O
views	O
using	O
the	O
tabs	O
during	O
this	O
process	O
.	O

It	O
's	O
pretty	O
much	O
all	O
working	O
apart	O
from	O
getting	O
the	O
users	O
location	O
from	O
the	O
AsyncTask	O
.	O

The	O
webservice	O
code	O
is	O
written	O
,	O
the	O
mapping	O
and	O
overlay	O
code	O
is	O
written	O
,	O
the	O

+	O
"	O

:	O

gave	O

this	O
warning	O
:	O

Multiple	O
markers	O
at	O
this	O
line	O

Syntax	O
error	O
on	O
token	O
"	O
++	O
"	O
,	O
+	O

expected	O

Invalid	O
argument	O
to	O
operation	O
++	O
/	O

This	O
makes	O
sense	O
,	O
because	O
++	O
on	O
its	O
own	O
is	O
an	O
operator	O
of	O
sorts	O
.	O

Interestingly	O
,	O
however	O
,	O
if	O
I	O
put	O
a	O
space	O
between	O
the	O
"	O
++	O
"	O
,	O
then	O
the	O
warning	O
disappears	O
.	O

I	O
did	O
n't	O
paste	O
my	O
entire	O
code	O
for	O
the	O
sake	O
of	O
readability	O
,	O
but	O
if	O
necessary	O
,	O
I	O
can	O
edit	O
and	O
add	O
it	O
in	O
.	O

Some	O
clarification	O
regarding	O
this	O
would	O
be	O
helpful	O
.	O

Thank	O
you	O
.	O

No	O
,	O
it	O
's	O
not	O
a	O
bug	O
.	O

It	O
's	O
unusual	O
,	O
but	O
it	O
's	O
not	O
a	O
bug	O
.	O

The	O
first	O
thing	O
to	O
do	O
is	O
simplify	O
the	O
example	O
massively	O
:	O

Result	O
:	O

Now	O
admittedly	O
I	O
'm	O
using	O
strings	O
for	O
both	O
start	O
and	O
end	O
,	O
but	O
due	O
to	O
+	O
being	O
left-associative	O
,	O
that	O
does	O
n't	O
make	O
any	O
difference	O
here	O
.	O

(	O
If	O
start	O
were	O
an	O
integer	O
,	O
the	O
first	O
binary	O
+	O
operator	O
would	O
be	O
integer	O
addition	O
in	O
both	O
cases	O
.	O
)	O

Basically	O
,	O
the	O
extra	O
+	O
ends	O
up	O
being	O
a	O
unary	O
+	O
operator	O
with	O
'	O
\t	O
'	O
as	O
the	O
operand	O
.	O

Unary	O
numeric	O
promotion	O
is	O
applied	O
to	O
the	O
char	O
,	O
giving	O
int	O
as	O
a	O
result	O
.	O

So	O
the	O
code	O
becomes	O
effectively	O
:	O

which	O
is	O
effectively	O
:	O

which	O
is	O
effectively	O

..	O
.	O
at	O
which	O
point	O
it	O
's	O
hopefully	O
clear	O
why	O
you	O
're	O
getting	O
the	O
output	O
you	O
are	O
.	O

To	O
avoid	O
accidentally	O
ending	O
up	O
treating	O
a	O
character	O
as	O
an	O
integer	O
,	O
it	O
's	O
probably	O
best	O
to	O
just	O
use	O
strings	O
instead	O
at	O
which	O
point	O
the	O
code	O
wo	O
n't	O
compile	O
because	O
there	O
's	O
no	O
unary	O
+	O
operator	O
for	O
String	O
:	O

.	O
.	O
gives	O
:	O

The	O
problem	O
is	O
not	O
just	O
with	O
the	O
+	O
+	O
in	O
your	O
code	O
.	O

But	O
it	O
's	O
also	O
with	O
the	O
fact	O
that	O
you	O
are	O
using	O
char	O
'	O
\t	O
'	O
and	O
not	O
String	O
"	O
\t	O
"	O
.	O

So	O
when	O
you	O
use	O
System.out.println	O
(	O
"	O
Hello	O
"	O
+	O
'	O
\t'	O
)	O
;	O
,	O
the	O
\t	O
is	O
taken	O
as	O
a	O
character	O
literal	O
and	O
appended	O
to	O
the	O
string	O
as	O
\t	O
.	O

But	O
when	O
you	O
use	O
System.out.println	O
(	O
"	O
Hello	O
"	O
+	O
+	O
'	O
\t'	O
)	O
;	O
,	O
it	O
becomes	O
effectively	O
System.out.println	O
(	O
"	O
Hello	O
"	O
+	O
(	O
+	O
'	O
\t'	O
)	O
)	O
;	O
.	O

So	O
it	O
is	O
treated	O
as	O
an	O
int	O
by	O
java	B-Skill
.	O

You	O
only	O
assign	O
+	O
and	O
signs	O
to	O
ints	O
,	O
not	O
chars	O
.	O

Remember	O
you	O
can	O
do	O
int	O
i	O
=	O
+2	O
or	O
-2	O
or	O
+	O
+	O
2	O
.	O

And	O
the	O
ASCII	O
value	O
of	O
\t	O
is	O
9	O
.	O

Hence	O
it	O
gets	O
appended	O
to	O
the	O
string	O
and	O
get	O
's	O
printed	O
as	O
Hello9	O
.	O

I	O
have	O
this	O
jQuery	B-Skill
plugin	O
here	O
:	O

That	O
I	O
use	O
like	O
so	O
:	O

That	O
does	O
the	O
job	O
for	O
rotating	O
it	O
very	O
nice	O
,	O
but	O
I	O
'd	O
like	O
to	O
animate	O
the	O
rotation	O
process	O
,	O
what	O
can	O
be	O
done	O
to	O
make	O
it	O
happen	O
with	O
the	O
given	O
plugin	B-Skill
?	O

(	O
fyi	O
:	O
changing	O
animate	O
:	O
false	O
to	O
true	O
does	O
n't	O
enable	O
it	O

)	O

you	O
.	O

You	O

in	O

UI	O
thread	O
.	O

You	O
ca	O

draw	O

.	O

It	O
will	O
use	O
an	O

algorithm	O
which	O
allows	O
for	O
background	O
drawing	O
.	O

I	O
am	O

data	O
across	O
two	O
sibling	O
components	O

an	O

.	O

to	O
use	O

of	O
Subject	O
,	O
so	O
is	O
it	O
possible	O
?	O

I	O
am	O
new	O
to	O
reactive	O
programming	O
,	O
and	O
I	O
am	O
confused	O
.	O

use	O
a	O
global	O
variable	O
instead	O
of	O
injectible	O
.	O

so	O
that	O
you	O
can	O
access	O
them	O
through	O
out	O
your	O
project	O
.	O

1.create	O
a	O
property	O
in	O
DTO	O
.	O

2.import	O
in	O
that	O
component	O
where	O
you	O
want	O
to	O
use	O
.	O

3.create	O
a	O
variable	O
of	O
that	O
type	O
in	O
constructor	O
's	O
parameter	O
.	O

4.access	O
with	O
the	O
use	O
of	O
that	O
variable	O
.	O

I	O
'm	O
running	O
Spark	B-Skill
1.4.1	O
on	O
my	O
local	O
Mac	O
laptop	O
and	O
am	O

to	O
use	O
pyspark	B-Skill
interactively	O
without	O
any	O
issues	O
.	O

Spark	B-Skill
was	O
installed	O
through	O
Homebrew	B-Skill
and	O
I	O
'm	O
using	O
Anaconda	B-Skill
Python	B-Skill
.	O

However	O
,	O
as	O
soon	O
as	O
I	O
try	O
to	O
use	O
spark-submit	O
,	O
I	O
get	O
the	O
following	O
error	O
:	O

Here	O
is	O
my	O
code	O
:	O

If	O
I	O
move	O
the	O
file	O
to	O
anywhere	O
in	O
the	O
/usr/local/Cellar/apache-spark/1.4.1/	O
directory	O
,	O
then	O
spark-submit	O
works	O
fine	O
.	O

I	O
have	O
my	O
environment	O
variables	O
set	O
as	O
follows	O
:	O

I	O
'm	O
sure	O
something	O
is	O
set	O
incorrectly	O
in	O
my	O
environment	O
,	O
but	O
I	O
ca	O
n't	O
seem	O
to	O
track	O
it	O
down	O
.	O

The	O
python	O
files	O
that	O
are	O
executed	O
by	O
spark-submit	O
should	O
be	O
on	O
the	O
PYTHONPATH	O
.	O

Either	O
add	O
the	O
full	O
path	O
of	O
the	O
directory	O
by	O
doing	O
:	O

or	O
you	O
can	O
also	O
add	O
'	O
.	O
'	O
to	O
the	O
PYTHONPATH	O
if	O
you	O
are	O
already	O
inside	O
the	O
directory	O
where	O
the	O
python	B-Skill
script	O
is	O

Thanks	O
to	O
@Def_Os	O
for	O
pointing	O
that	O
out	O
!	O

I	O
'm	O
trying	O
to	O
write	O
some	O
generic	O
code	O
for	O
handling	O
drops	O
in	O
WPF	B-Skill
drop	O
targets	O
.	O

AllowDrop	O
is	O
set	O
to	O
true	O
,	O
and	O
I	O
've	O
hooked	O
onto	O
DragEnter	O
,	O
DragOver	O
,	O
DragLeave	O
,	O
&	O
Drop	O
on	O
the	O
drop	O
target	O
UIElement	O
.	O

Using	O
the	O
bubbling	O
events	O
enables	O
nesting	O
of	O
drop	O
targets	O
.	O

Note	O
I	O
have	O
no	O
access	O
to	O
the	O
drag	O
source	O
this	O
is	O
inter-application	O
drag	O
&	O
drop	O
.	O

If	O
I	O
have	O
some	O
UI	O
cleanup	O
to	O
perform	O
at	O
the	O
end	O
of	O
a	O
potential	O
drop	O
,	O
and	O
the	O
user	O
presses	O
Esc	O
to	O
cancel	O
the	O
drop	O
,	O
the	O
drop	O
target	O
never	O
seems	O
to	O
gets	O
a	O
specific	O
event	O
that	O
I	O
can	O
differentiate	O
from	O
all	O
the	O
others	O
.	O

Drop	O
is	O
easy	O
but	O
what	O
indicates	O
a	O
cancel	O
?	O

The	O
problem	O
I	O
have	O
is	O
this	O
:	O

DragLeave	O
is	O
a	O
bubbling	O
routed	O
event	O
.	O

e.OriginalSource	O
is	O
always	O
set	O
for	O
this	O
event	O
(	O
and	O
the	O
corresponding	O
Preview	O
)	O
via	O
hittesting	O
.	O

The	O
target	O
is	O
an	O
ItemsControl	O
(	O
Listbox	O
is	O
what	O
I	O
've	O
currently	O
been	O
testing	O
with	O
)	O
.	O

As	O
I	O
drag	O
over	O
my	O
intended	O
drop	O
target	O
,	O
I	O
get	O
loads	O
of	O
DragLeave	O
events	O
from	O
the	O
child	O
visuals	O
within	O
the	O
target	O
.	O

I	O
never	O
get	O
any	O
from	O
the	O
target	O
itself	O
.	O

Grids	O
,	O
rectangles	O
,	O
borders	O
,	O
textblocks	O
,	O
they	O
all	O
happily	O
send	O
me	O
DragLeave	O
,	O
but	O
none	O
from	O
the	O
actual	O
ItemsControl	O
I	O
'm	O
connected	O
up	O
to	O
.	O

I	O
thought	O
it	O
might	O
be	O
a	O
hittesting	O
problem	O
,	O
but	O
I	O
've	O
set	O
the	O
Background	O
of	O
the	O
ItemsControl	O
to	O
a	O
colour	O
,	O
and	O
it	O
makes	O
no	O
difference	O
.	O

What	O
am	O
I	O
missing	O
?	O

How	O
am	O
I	O
supposed	O
to	O
determine	O
that	O
a	O
drop	O
operation	O
has	O
definitely	O
finished	O
?	O

(	O
The	O
actual	O
problem	O
I	O
'm	O
trying	O
to	O
solve	O
is	O
that	O
I	O
'm	O
implementing	O
some	O
custom	O
dragging	O
behaviour	O
in	O
a	O
TreeView	O
that	O
expands	O
folders	O
when	O
you	O
hover	O

Thanks	O

?	O

The	O
type	O

does	O

one	O

or	O

Bot	O

are	O

I	O
.	O

If	O

the	O
following	O
(	O
now	O

will	O
match	O
the	O

of	O

)	O

I	O
have	O
standard	O

repository	O
with	O
Git	B-Skill
submodules	O
.	O

It	O
is	O

id	O

by	O

does	O
not	O
match	O
actual	O
HEAD	O
for	O
specific	O
submodule	O
,	O
git	O
status	O
from	O

repository	O
reports	O

by	O
(	O
new	O

)	O
(	O
for	O
example	O
)	O
:	O

.	O

that	O

:	O

What	O

repository	O
"	O
thinks	O
"	O
:	O

What	O

"	O

"	O
:	O

:	O

unable	O

will	O
reference	O
http://www.[yourwebsite].com/src/main/webapp/resources/js/template/Event/EventMainTemplate.html	O

That	O
has	O

a	O

before	O

I	O

.	O

Hopefully	O
,	O

.	O

I	O
need	O
help	O
in	O
the	O
part	O
where	O
socket	O
receives	O
an	O
event	O
.	O

Please	O
comment	O
if	O
you	O
require	O
any	O
more	O

from	O
me	O

You	O
can	O
try	O
this	O
,	O
provided	O
#messages	O
is	O
the	O
scroll-able	O
area	O
in	O
your	O
DOM	B-Skill
.	O

wrap	O
the	O
ul.messages	O
in	O
a	O
div	O
with	O
a	O
class	O
=	O
"	O
msg-con	O
"	O

now	O
add	O
the	O
javascript	B-Skill

hope	O
this	O
works	O
..	O
.	O

Given	O
three	O
major	O
competing	O
applications	O
each	O
implementing	O
a	O
slightly	O
different	O
data	O
schema	O
for	O
the	O
same	O
problem	O
domain	O
,	O
I	O
am	O
faced	O
with	O
the	O
task	O
of	O
implementing	O
:	O

a	O
"	O
canonical	O
"	O
data	O
schema	O
expressive	O
enough	O
to	O
represent	O
something	O
like	O
the	O
intersection	O
set	O
of	O
features	O
of	O
all	O
3	O
applications	O
as	O
well	O
as	O
additional	O
details	O
(	O
meta	O
data	O
)	O

converters	O
for	O
doing	O
(	O
bidirectional	O
)	O
data	O
exchange	O
between	O
those	O
3	O
applications	O
and	O
the	O
canonical	O
schema	O

How	O
I	O
currently	O
approach	O
the	O
task	O

The	O
canonical	O
schema	O
is	O
defined	O
using	O
XSD	O
and	O
closely	O
resembles	O
the	O
data	O
schema	O
of	O
one	O
of	O
the	O
3	O
applications	O
,	O
let	O
's	O
call	O
it	O
A	O
.	O

This	O
renders	O
data	O
exchange	O
with	O
A	O
trivial	O
.	O

In	O
order	O
to	O
allow	O
for	O
a	O
bidirectional	O
data	O
exchange	O
with	O
applications	O
B	O
and	O
C	O
(	O
create	O
some	O
state	O
in	O
A	O
,	O
load	O
it	O
into	O
B	O
,	O
alter	O
it	O
in	O
B	O
,	O
load	O
the	O
altered	O
state	O
into	O
A	O
)	O
,	O
I	O
try	O
to	O
map	O
simples	O
states	O
in	O
A	O
onto	O
more	O
complex	O
states	O
in	O
B/C	O
which	O
can	O
be	O
identified	O
and	O
deconstructed	O
in	O
the	O
reverse	O
mapping	O
.	O

Why	O
I	O
want	O
to	O
change	O
my	O
approach	O

Most	O
of	O
the	O
schema	O
mappings	O
are	O
pretty	O
trivial	O
(	O
the	O
name	O
of	O
an	O
object	O
in	O
A	O
simply	O
maps	O
to	O
the	O
name	O
of	O
the	O
object	O
in	O
B	O
)	O
,	O
so	O
I	O
would	O
like	O
to	O
avoid	O
writing	O
a	O
lot	O
of	O
trivial	O
code	O
by	O
hand	O
.	O

I	O
imagine	O
that	O
this	O
trivial	O
code	O
could	O
be	O
generated	O
given	O
a	O
formalized	O
mapping	O
between	O
the	O
data	O
schemes	O
.	O

For	O
the	O
nontrivial	O
parts	O
of	O
the	O
mapping	O
(	O
like	O
the	O
one	O
desribed	O
above	O
)	O
,	O
I	O
expect	O
lots	O
of	O
changes	O
in	O
the	O
future	O
simply	O
because	O
it	O
seems	O
so	O
arbitrary	O
.	O

In	O
many	O
cases	O
a	O
specific	O
convention	O
for	O
mapping	O
states	O
in	O
A	O
onto	O
more	O
complex	O
states	O
in	O
B/C	O
might	O
run	O
into	O
a	O
dead	O
end	O
at	O
some	O
point	O
.	O

For	O
example	O
it	O
might	O
become	O
necessary	O
for	O
users	O
to	O
change	O
the	O
"	O
mirrored	O
subspace	O
"	O
label	O
and	O
therefore	O
another	O
approach	O
for	O
identifying	O
conversion	O
artifacts	O
might	O
be	O
necessary	O
.	O

I	O
imagine	O
that	O
a	O
formalized	O
mapping	O
could	O
be	O
a	O
tool	O
to	O
transparently	O
manage	O
those	O
conventions	O
.	O

Maybe	O
a	O
reasoner	O
could	O
even	O
automatically	O
spot	O
incoherent	O
,	O
inconsistent	O
mappings	O
.	O

It	O
might	O
also	O
allow	O
me	O
to	O
more	O
easily	O
discuss	O
the	O
mapping	O
with	O
domain	O
experts	O
and	O
users	O
.	O

Questions	O

From	O
what	O
I	O
read	O
about	O
ontologies	O
I	O
have	O
the	O
impression	O
that	O
what	O
I	O
want	O
is	O
an	O
ontology	O
.	O

Is	O
this	O
correct	O
?	O

As	O
I	O
understand	O
it	O
,	O
using	O
an	O
ontology	O
to	O
describe	O
the	O
mapping	O
would	O
also	O
require	O
me	O
to	O
express	O
the	O
data	O
schemes	O
themselves	O
in	O
the	O
ontology	O
(	O
so	O
a	O
relation	O
"	O
maps	O
to	O
"	O
can	O
reference	O
a	O
type	O
from	O
A	O
and	O
a	O
type	O
from	O
B	O
)	O
.	O

Since	O
those	O
schemes	O
are	O
taken	O
from	O
long-lived	O
applications	O
,	O
they	O
are	O
not	O
always	O
coherent	O
.	O

For	O
example	O
,	O
a	O
"	O
feature	O
"	O
in	O
the	O
application	O
might	O
cause	O
some	O
state	O
to	O
have	O
a	O
different	O
semantic	O
that	O
you	O
would	O
expect	O
from	O
the	O
semantics	O
of	O
its	O
constituents	O
.	O

Can	O
existing	O
tools	O
help	O
me	O
with	O
managing	O
those	O
complexities	O
?	O

I	O
expect	O
that	O
I	O
would	O
require	O
some	O
additional	O
machinery	O
inside	O
the	O
ontology	O
to	O
describe	O
something	O
like	O
-taken	O
from	O
the	O
example	O
above	O
the	O
difference	O
between	O
a	O
"	O
permanent	O
mirrored	O
subspace	O
"	O
and	O
a	O
"	O
dissipating	O
mirrored	O
subspace	O
"	O
(	O
two	O
types	O
+	O
a	O
special	O
relation	O
reconnecting	O
them	O
?	O
)	O
.	O

Would	O
this	O
be	O
much	O
effort	O
to	O
do	O
?	O

Do	O
available	O
ontology	O
languages	O
provide	O
something	O
out-of-the-box	O
to	O
express	O
this	O
?	O

Is	O
this	O
application	O
of	O
ontologies	O
a	O
common	O
application	O
for	O
ontologies	O
or	O
is	O
it	O
a	O
corner	O
case	O
?	O

Do	O
you	O
know	O
of	O
companies	O
who	O
provide	O
services	O
for	O
this	O
application	O
?	O

Which	O
tools	O
would	O
you	O
suggest	O
for	O
creating	O
the	O
ontology	O
?	O

I	O
assume	O
there	O
are	O
no	O
off-the-shelf	O
tools	O
available	O
for	O
the	O
code	O
generation	O
mentioned	O
.	O

So	O
how	O
would	O
you	O
approach	O
the	O
code	O
generation	O
task	O
?	O

Abstracting	O
a	O
type	O
system	O
,	O
a	O
set	O
of	O
interfaces	O
,	O
and	O
rules	O
for	O
transformation	O
is	O
defined	O
as	O
subset	O
of	O
ontology	O
creation	O
known	O
as	O
a	O

.	O

The	O
Meta	O
Object	O
Facility	O
(	O
MOF	O
)	O
is	O
an	O
example	O
:	O

Topic	O
Maps	O
are	O
another	O
:	O

References	O

InfoGrid	O
Web	O
Graph	O
Database	O
:	O

are	O
the	O
differences	O
between	O
a	O

Android	B-Skill

:	O
same	O

.	O

.	O

(	O

)	O

.	O

I	O
am	O

a	O

from	O

command	O
is	O
the	O

:	O

I	O

:	O
.	O

.jar	O

Could	O

?	O

I	O
have	O

the	O
.jar	O

.	O

.	O

.	O

I	O
'm	O

to	O

Here	O
is	O
a	O
great	O
tutorial	O
series	O
by	O
Alex	O
from	O
Codecourse	O
on	O

with	O

.	O

Carbon	B-Skill
Tutorial	O

This	O
is	O
my	O
first	O
time	O
on	O
stackexchange	O
,	O
facing	O
a	O
problem	O
I	O
have	O
n't	O
been	O
able	O
to	O
find	O
a	O
solution	O
to	O
with	O
numerous	O
hours	O
spent	O
on	O
Google	O
.	O

Apologies	O
in	O
advance	O
for	O
the	O
lack	O
of	O
more	O
images	O
,	O
stackexchange	O
will	O
not	O
allow	O
me	O
to	O
more	O
photos	O
until	O
my	O
reputation	O
is	O
higher	O
.	O

I	O
need	O
to	O
get	O
results	O
from	O
a	O
.do	O
page	O
:	O

http://webapps2.rrc.state.tx.us/EWA/productionQueryAction.do	O

The	O
url	O
remains	O
static	O
when	O
a	O
large	O
query	O
e.g	O
is	O
submitted	O
I	O
cannot	O
alter	O
my	O
query	O
by	O
changing	O
the	O
url	O
.	O

Once	O
submitted	O
,	O
it	O
takes	O
a	O
long	O
time	O
to	O
load	O
,	O
and	O
after	O
loading	O
,	O
a	O
table	O
of	O
results	O
is	O
presented	O
.	O

I	O
then	O
require	O
all	O
the	O
data	O
to	O
be	O
on	O
one	O
page	O
so	O
I	O
select	O
'	O
View	O
All	O
'	O
as	O
the	O
page	O
size	O
from	O
the	O
drop	O
down	O
menu	O
on	O
the	O
top	O
left	O
of	O
the	O
table	O
to	O
obtain	O
the	O
following	O
page	O
(	O
which	O
has	O
many	O
more	O
rows	O
than	O
displayed	O
here	O
)	O

Finally	O
,	O
to	O
then	O
import	O
this	O
data	O
,	O
I	O
open	O
a	O
spreadsheet	O
and	O
copy-paste	O
it	O
all	O
in	O
.	O

Even	O
for	O
one	O
county/query/submission	O
,	O
this	O
process	O
is	O
extremely	O
tedious	O
,	O
and	O
I	O
have	O
to	O
do	O
this	O
monthly	O
for	O
about	O
20	O
counties	O
,	O
then	O
a	O
further	O
10	O
districts	O
.	O

Due	O
to	O
the	O
long	O
load	O
time	O
associated	O
with	O
the	O
return	O
of	O
each	O
query	O
,	O
this	O
is	O
a	O
task	O
that	O
easily	O
takes	O
2-3	O
hours	O
to	O
complete	O
.	O

As	O
such	O
,	O
I	O
am	O
hoping	O
someone	O
here	O
has	O
some	O
kind	O
of	O
solution	O
to	O
automate/ease	O
the	O
process	O
,	O
or	O
even	O
simply	O
advice	O
as	O
to	O
where	O
I	O
can	O
find	O
information	O
to	O
create	O
a	O
solution	O
myself	O
.	O

If	O
I	O
could	O
directly	O
query	O
the	O
database	O

the	O
data	O
into	O
a	O
spreadsheet	O
,	O
my	O
problem	O
would	O
be	O

.	O

The	O
load	O
times	O
are	O
irrelevant	O
if	O
the	O
entire	O
process	O
of	O
querying	O
the	O
server	B-Skill
can	O

automated	O
as	O

could	O
just	O
run	O
in	O
the	O
background	O
without	O
user	O
input	O
.	O

I	O
apologise	O
for	O
the	O
long	O
and	O
non-specific	O
question	O
,	O
and	O
any	O
response	O
will	O
be	O

.	O

Thank	O
you	O
very	O
much	O
.	O

Well	O
,	O
you	O
can	O
actually	O
check	O
the	O
network	O
calls	O
that	O
are	O
executed	O
in	O
order	O
to	O
get	O
the	O
CSV	O
file	O
.	O

I	O
just	O
did	O
that	O
for	O
you	O
,	O
but	O
it	O
contains	O
a	O
lot	O
of	O
parameters	O
which	O
you	O
need	O
to	O
send	O
in	O
.	O

Below	O
are	O
the	O
actual	O
parameters	O
you	O
need	O
to	O
send	O
in	O
:	O

I	O
hope	O
for	O
you	O
that	O
only	O
the	O
parameters	O
prefixed	O
with	O

are	O
important	O
(	O
they	O
contain	O
the	O
information	O
of	O
the	O
form	O
,	O
like	O
the	O
month/year/.	O
.	O

The	O
actionManager	O
prefixed	O
parameters	O
contain	O
some	O
complicated	O
data	O
,	O
you	O
need	O
to	O
define	O
them	O
(	O
else	O
you	O
get	O
an	O
error	O
)	O
,	O
but	O
I	O
do	O
n't	O
know	O
if	O
they	O
're	O
actually	O
used	O
,	O
so	O
you	O
might	O
just	O
leave	O
them	O
empty	O
.	O

When	O

this	O
call	O
,	O

will	O

(	O

.	O

However	O
,	O

(	O

)	O
,	O

this	O

to	O

,	O
and	O

change	O
.	O

Example	O
using	O
PHP	B-Skill

The	O
following	O
code	O
is	O
an	O
example	O
in	O
PHP	B-Skill
retrieving	O
the	O
CSV	O
(	O
using	O
cURL	B-Skill
)	O
and	O
parsing	O
it	O
into	O
an	O
array	B-Skill
.	O

From	O
what	O
you	O
are	O
describing	O
,	O
this	O
sounds	O
like	O
an	O
issue	O
with	O
the	O
Database	O
taking	O
the	O
time	O
to	O
generate	O
the	O
results	O
.	O

If	O
this	O
is	O
the	O
case	O
,	O
do	O
you	O
know	O
if	O
there	O
are	O
any	O
indexes	O
on	O
the	O
database	O
being	O
queried	O
?	O

If	O
you	O
are	O
querying	O
data	O
across	O
multiple	O
linked	O
tables	O
(	O
which	O
it	O
looks	O
&	O

)	O
,	O

,	O

will	O

like	O
a	O

.	O

This	O
website	O

to	O

that	O
may	O

worth	O
taking	O
a	O
look	O
at	O
.	O

Other	O
than	O
this	O
,	O

may	O

to	O
setup	O
a	O
cron	B-Skill
to	O

for	O

like	O
Anusha	O
has	O
described	O
in	O
the	O

.	O

I	O
would	O
recommend	O
looking	O
into	O
indexes	O
as	O
well	O
as	O
setting	O
up	O
the	O
cron	B-Skill
jobs	O
,	O
as	O
rather	O
than	O
just	O
cut	O
down	O
the	O
amount	O
of	O
time	O

to	O
generate	O
the	O
data	O
each	O
month	O
,	O
you	O
could	O
fully	O
automate	O
it	O
,	O
and	O
have	O
it	O
running	O
in	O
a	O
few	O
minutes	O
,	O
rather	O
than	O
hours	O
each	O
month	O
.	O

I	O
have	O
an	O
EF	B-Skill
model	O
where	O
I	O
logically	O
have	O
a	O
"	O
template	O
"	O
type	O
and	O
an	O
"	O
instance	O
of	O
the	O
template	O
type	O
"	O

Basically	O
my	O
templates	O
are	O
like	O
a	O
work	O
flow	O
and	O
the	O
instances	O
are	O
those	O
templates	O
applied	O
to	O
an	O
object	O
.	O

The	O
association	O
is	O
that	O
a	O
template	O
has	O
zero	O
to	O
many	O
instances	O
,	O
an	O
instance	O
is	O
always	O
based	O
on	O
a	O
template	O
.	O

For	O
example	O
the	O
template	O
may	O
be	O
"	O
send	O
letter	O
"	O
which	O
gets	O
applied	O
to	O
a	O
customer	O
to	O
create	O
an	O
instance	O
of	O
the	O
letter	O
sent	O
,	O
which	O
includes	O
the	O
date	O
sent	O
,	O
the	O
pdf	O
of	O
the	O
letter	O
etc	O
.	O

The	O
templates	O
have	O
a	O
few	O
subclasses/types	O
which	O
will	O
always	O
match	O
an	O
instance	O
which	O
also	O
has	O
a	O
corresponding	O
subclass	O
.	O

The	O
issue	O
is	O
how	O
can	O
I	O
ensure	O
that	O
when	O
I	O
create	O
an	O
instance	O
(	O
which	O
will	O
have	O
a	O
reference	O
to	O
the	O
template	O
)	O
that	O
the	O
instance	O
is	O
of	O
the	O
correct	O
inherited	O
type	O
.	O

For	O
example	O
if	O
the	O
template	O
is	O
of	O
type	O
TemplateType2	O
(	O
inherits	O
from	O
template	O
)	O
and	O
I	O
add	O
an	O
instance	O
to	O
loan1	O
.	O
.	O
loan1.TemplateInstances.add(foo)	O
…	O
I	O
want	O
to	O
ensure	O
that	O
foo	O
is	O
of	O
type	O
InstanceType2	O
.	O

The	O
way	O
I	O
am	O
doing	O
it	O
now	O
seems	O
like	O
such	O
a	O
hack	O
.	O

I	O
am	O
storing	O
the	O
instance	O
entity	O
name	O
as	O
a	O
scalar	O
value	O
in	O
the	O
template	O
entity	O
,	O
and	O
using	O
reflection	O
to	O
create	O
the	O
correct	O
type	O
of	O
the	O
instance	O
.	O

It	O
works	O
,	O
but	O
it	O
is	O
basically	O
using	O
the	O
value	O
of	O
a	O
property	O
to	O
do	O
mapping	O
,	O
exposing	O
the	O
possibility	O
of	O
all	O
sorts	O
of	O
errors	O
if	O
they	O
do	O
not	O
match	O
the	O
name	O
of	O
the	O
instance	O
name	O
,	O
or	O
worse	O
if	O
they	O
enter	O
the	O
wrong	O
entity	O
name	O
.	O

Any	O
ideas	O
or	O
thoughts	O
how	O
to	O
tackle	O
this	O
issue	O
?	O

I	O
ended	O
up	O
solving	O
this	O
through	O
a	O
bit	O
of	O
a	O
hack	O
.	O

I	O
used	O
naming	O
conventions	O
and	O
adding	O
my	O
own	O
handler	O
to	O
the	O
context	O
savingchanges	O
method	O

and	O
then	O
a	O
bit	O
of	O
reflection	O
.	O

Not	O
the	O
best	O
solution	O
but	O
it	O
works	O
.	O

the	O
main	O
part	O
..	O
.	O

I	O
'm	O
trying	O
to	O
parse	O
a	O
string	O
with	O
parentheses	O
of	O
the	O
form	O
((Question)(Left_Node)(right_node))	O
.	O

The	O
question	O
for	O
example	O
will	O
be	O
of	O
the	O
form	O
"	O
if	O
segment	O
size	O
<	O
1.5	O
,	O
then	O
choose	O
left	O
node	O
,	O
else	O
right	O
"	O
.	O

The	O
question	O
can	O
be	O
a	O
dictionary	B-Skill
with	O
a	O
key	O
and	O
a	O
value	O
.	O

The	O
left	O
and	O
right	O
node	B-Skill
represent	O
a	O
complete	O
left	O
or	O
right	O
half	O
tree	B-Skill
,	O
which	O
will	O
be	O
traversed	O
recursively	O
until	O
the	O
leaf	O
node	B-Skill
is	O
reached	O
.	O

In	O
this	O
manner	O
we	O
will	O
build	O
a	O
binary	O
decision	O
tree	B-Skill
.	O

If	O
you	O
can	O
decide	O
on	O
the	O
details	O
of	O
the	O
input	O
format	O
,	O
then	O
use	O
raw	O
python	B-Skill
source	O
code	O
.	O

For	O
example	O
you	O
can	O
store	O
your	O
tree	B-Skill
in	O
a	O
python	B-Skill
dictionary	B-Skill
of	O
nodes	B-Skill
:	O

Now	O
you	O
can	O
parse	O
this	O
tree	B-Skill
simply	O
with	O
the	O
python	B-Skill
parser	O
.	O

Well	O
,	O
if	O
the	O
input	O
format	O
is	O
already	O
specified	O
,	O
then	O
we	O
cannot	O
help	O
you	O
if	O
you	O
do	O
n't	O
share	O
the	O
details	O
of	O
that	O
format	O
.	O

This	O
kind	O
of	O
syntax	O
is	O
really	O
the	O
target	O
for	O
pyparsing	B-Skill
.	O

The	O
basic	O
format	O
is	O
simple	O
enough	O
,	O
and	O
in	O
pyparsing	B-Skill
,	O
it	O
looks	O
like	O
:	O

But	O
once	O
you	O
start	O
to	O
add	O
arithmetic	O
expressions	O
,	O
and	O
boolean	O
operations	O
and	O
support	O
for	O
'	O
and	O
'	O
and	O
'	O
or	O
'	O
operators	O
,	O
things	O
get	O
complicated	O
.	O

Also	O
,	O
this	O
is	O
a	O
recursive	O
grammar	O
,	O
since	O
an	O
action	O
can	O
itself	O
be	O
a	O
nested	O
decision	O
.	O

Pyparsing	B-Skill
has	O
built-in	O
support	O
that	O
simplifies	O
definition	O
of	O
arithmetic	O
and	O
boolean	O
expressions	O
,	O
including	O
precedence	O
of	O
operations	O
and	O
gruping	O
in	O
parentheses	O
,	O
plus	O
recursive	O
expressions	O
.	O

Here	O
is	O
the	O
pyparsing	B-Skill
grammar	O
in	O
various	O
pieces	O
.	O

First	O
here	O
are	O
some	O
of	O
the	O
basic	O
parsing	O
elements	O
:	O

The	O
parse	O
action	O
attached	O
to	O
the	O
number	O
expression	O
will	O
automatically	O
convert	O
the	O
parsed	O
number	O
to	O
a	O
float	O
value	O
at	O
parse	O
time	O
.	O

The	O
Word	O
class	O
takes	O
two	O
strings	O
:	O
a	O
string	O
containing	O
all	O
valid	O
leading	O
characters	O
,	O
and	O
a	O
string	O
of	O
all	O
valid	O
body	O
characters	O
.	O

This	O
varname	O
definition	O
supports	O
variable	O
names	O
similar	O
to	O
Python	B-Skill
identifiers	O
.	O

Pyparsing	B-Skill
has	O
the	O
operatorPrecedence	O
method	O
that	O
takes	O
an	O
expression	O
for	O
the	O
basic	O
operand	O
definition	O
,	O
and	O
a	O
list	O
of	O
tuples	O
to	O
define	O
each	O
level	O
of	O
operators	O
:	O
an	O
expression	O
for	O
the	O
operators	O
,	O
an	O
integer	O
whether	O
the	O
operator	O
is	O
unary	O
,	O
binary	O
,	O
or	O
ternary	O
,	O
and	O
whether	O
left	O
or	O
right-associative	O
.	O

operatorPrecedence	O
takes	O
care	O
of	O
the	O
recursive	O
definition	O
of	O
arithmetic	O
expressions	O
nested	O
in	O
parentheses	O
.	O

This	O
expression	O
defines	O
basic	O
4-function	O
math	O
:	O

Now	O
here	O
is	O
the	O
definition	O
of	O
a	O
boolean	O
condition	O
(	O
which	O
we	O
'll	O
eventually	O
use	O
to	O
define	O
the	O
decision	O
question	O
)	O
:	O

Your	O
definition	O
of	O
actions	O
was	O
a	O
little	O
sketchy	O
,	O
so	O
I	O
made	O
up	O
some	O
possible	O
statements	O
:	O
an	O
assignment	O
statement	O
,	O
a	O
print	O
statement	O
,	O
and	O
since	O
this	O
is	O
a	O
speech	O
application	O
,	O
a	O
say	O
statement	O
which	O
is	O
very	O
simliar	O
to	O
print	O
.	O

In	O
addition	O
to	O
the	O
expression	O
definitions	O
,	O
you	O
'll	O
notice	O
that	O
some	O
expressions	O
are	O
followed	O
by	O
a	O
quoted	O
string	O
,	O
as	O
if	O
the	O
expression	O
is	O
a	O
function	O
being	O
called	O
with	O
that	O
string	O
.	O

In	O
fact	O
,	O
this	O
"	O
call	O
"	O
actually	O
returns	O
a	O
copy	O
of	O
the	O
expression	O
,	O
and	O
the	O
matched	O
tokens	O
are	O
tagged	O
with	O
that	O
name	O
.	O

These	O
results	O
names	O
are	O
very	O
helpful	O
at	O
post-parsing	O
time	O
at	O
picking	O
out	O
the	O
individual	O
matching	O
elements	O
(	O
similar	O
to	O
named	O
groups	O
in	O
regular	O
expressions	O
)	O
.	O

Finally	O
,	O
to	O
put	O
these	O
pieces	O
together	O
into	O
your	O
decision	O
expression	O
,	O
here	O
are	O
the	O
question	O
and	O
action	O
expressions	O
:	O

Note	O
that	O
the	O
action	O
definition	O
can	O
include	O
a	O
decision	O
,	O
but	O
action	O
is	O
used	O
to	O
define	O
decision	O
.	O

To	O
break	O
this	O
chicken-and-egg	O
dependency	O
,	O
we	O
preface	O
this	O
section	O
with	O
defining	O
decision	O
,	O
but	O
with	O
a	O
placeholder	O
expression	O
using	O
the	O
pyparsing	B-Skill
Forward	O
class	O
:	O

Then	O
after	O
question	O
and	O
action	O
are	O
defined	O
,	O
we	O
use	O
the	O
'	O
<<	O
'	O
operator	O
to	O
"	O
insert	O
"	O
the	O
actual	O
expression	O
definition	O
in	O
the	O
existing	O
decision	O
variable	O
:	O

Again	O
,	O
I	O
took	O
liberties	O
with	O
your	O
defined	O
format	O
,	O
thinking	O
that	O
an	O
optional	O
else-clause	O
might	O
be	O
useful	O
.	O

If	O
you	O
do	O
n't	O
want	O
this	O
to	O
be	O
optional	O
,	O
just	O
remove	O
the	O
Optional	O
wrapper	O
around	O
the	O
Group(action)("elseAction")	O
.	O

That	O
defines	O
the	O
grammar	O
,	O
now	O
here	O
are	O
some	O
test	O
cases	O
.	O

Using	O
dump()	O
on	O
the	O
results	O
returned	O
by	O
parseString	O
is	O
a	O
nice	O
way	O
to	O
print	O
out	O
the	O
tokens	O
,	O
and	O
any	O
names	O
attached	O
to	O
them	O
.	O

Here	O
's	O
the	O
output	O
:	O

Here	O
is	O
a	O
link	O
to	O
the	O
full	O
parsing	O
program	O
http://pastebin.com/DnaNrx7j	O
.	O

This	O
is	O
just	O
the	O
first	O
stage	O
,	O
parsing	O
the	O
input	O
.	O

next	O
step	O

actually	O

expression	O
by	O
processing	O
the	O
returned	O
tokens	O
.	O

The	O
pyparsing	B-Skill
wiki	O
example	O

(	O
http://pyparsing.wikispaces.com/file/view/simpleBool.py	O
)	O
includes	O

example	O
of	O

actions	O
to	O

parsed	O
tokens	O
into	O
callable	O
class	O

that	O
simplify	O

the	O
results	O
.	O

Hope	O
this	O
helps	O
.	O

I	O
have	O
noticed	O
people	O
use	O
this	O
code	O
to	O
localize	O

Could	O
anyone	O
tell	O
me	O
what	O
CurrentUICulture	O
and	O
CurrentCulture	O
are	O
?	O

Why	O
do	O
we	O
need	O
to	O
assign	O
same	O
value	O
to	O
both	O

What	O
will	O

if	O
I	O
assign	O
the	O
value	O
CultureInfo("fr-FR")	O
;	O
to	O
only	O
CurrentUICulture	O
or	O
CurrentCulture	O
?	O

I	O
would	O
really	O
like	O
to	O
know	O
in	O
detail	O
what	O
CurrentUICulture	O
and	O
CurrentCulture	O
does	O
?	O

Suppose	O
client	O
pc	O
language	O
setting	O
could	O
be	O
German	O
or	O
French	O
etc	O
.	O
,	O
but	O
I	O
want	O
to	O
develop	O
my	O
application	O
in	O
such	O
a	O
way	O
that	O

,	O

will	O

in	O
that	O
pc	O
with	O
their	O
language	O
setting	O
.	O

I	O
mean	O
that	O
all	O
the	O
controls	O
will	O

the	O
text	O
in	O
German	O
or	O

.	O

I	O
do	O

culture	O
this	O
way	O
CultureInfo("fr-FR")	O

of	O

.	O

How	O
would	O

go	O
about	O

?	O

It	O
's	O
pretty	O
simple	O
.	O

CurrentCulture	O
is	O
the	O
culture	O
assigned	O
for	O
thread	O
to	O
be	O
used	O
in	O
various	O
culture-specific	O
methods	O
.	O

To	O
example	O
,	O
ToString()	O
one	O
.	O

CurrentUICulture	O
is	O

By	O
setting	O
both	O
you	O
ensure	O
what	O
all	O
ToString()	O
works	O
correctly	O
and	O
your	O
form	O
resources	O
are	O
loaded	O
from	O
appropriate	O
satellite	O
.	O

Regarding	O
usage	O
,	O
you	O
may	O
think	O
to	O
provide	O
user	O
with	O
option	O
to	O
change	O
language	O
.	O

To	O
example	O
,	O
I	O
have	O
native	O
German	O
windows	O
,	O
but	O
I	O
set	O
English	O
culture	O
in	O
it	O
(	O
date	O

and	O
default	O
culture	O
for	O
console	B-Skill
applications	I-Skill
)	O
,	O
while	O
I	O
speak	O
Russian	O
.	O

Which	O
language	O
do	O
you	O
think	O

will	O

when	O

software	O
?	O

=P	O

,	O
either	O

language	O

in	O
installer	B-Skill
(	O

installer	B-Skill

to	O

there	O
)	O

current	O

user	O
language	O
preferences	O
.	O

One	O
possible	O
scenario	O
:	O

:	O
application	O
is	O
already	O
localized	O
,	O
satellites	O
are	O
there	O
(	O

.	O

to	O
start	O
with	O
.	O

application	O

you	O
create	O

"	O

Android	B-Skill
Wear	I-Skill
does	O
not	O
support	O
WebView	O
.	O

More	O
concretely	O
,	O
examine	O
the	O
original	O
exception	O
:	O

Since	O
Android	B-Skill
4.4	O
or	O
thereabouts	O
,	O
WebView	O
is	O
provided	O
by	O
the	O
"	O
System	B-Skill
WebView	I-Skill
"	O
app	O
,	O
which	O
means	O
Android	B-Skill
has	O
to	O
do	O
some	O
gyrations	O
to	O
get	O
its	O
hand	O
on	O
the	O
guts	O
of	O
WebView	O
implementation	O
when	O
you	O
request	O
to	O
display	O
the	O
WebView	O
.	O

Here	O
,	O
NullWebViewFactoryProvider	O
means	O
"	O
we	O
do	O
not	O
have	O
a	O
System	B-Skill
WebView	I-Skill
to	O
use	O
"	O
.	O

I	O
have	O
an	O
input	O
field	O

XAML	B-Skill
:	O

Code	O
Behind	O
:	O

Output	O
:	O

When	O
compiling	O
a	O
64bit	O
application	O
,	O
why	O
does	O
strlen()	O
return	O
a	O
64-bit	O
integer	O
?	O

Am	O
i	O
missing	O
somthing	O
?	O

I	O
understand	O
that	O
strlen()	O
returns	O
a	O
size_t	O
type	O
,	O
and	O
by	O
definition	O
this	O
should	O
n't	O
change	O
,	O
but	O
..	O
.	O
Why	O
would	O
strlen	O
need	O
to	O
return	O
a	O
64-bit	O
integer	O
?	O

The	O
function	O
is	O
designed	O
to	O
be	O
used	O
with	O
strings	O
.	O

With	O
that	O
said	O
:	O

Do	O
programmers	O
commonly	O
create	O
multi-gigabyte	O
or	O
multi-terabyte	O
strings	O
?	O

If	O
they	O
did	O
,	O
would	O
n't	O
they	O
need	O
a	O
better	O
way	O
to	O
determine	O
the	O
string	O
length	O
than	O
searching	O
for	O
a	O
NULL	O
character	O
?	O

I	O
think	O
this	O
is	O
ridiculous	O
,	O
in	O
fact	O
,	O
maybe	O
we	O
need	O
a	O
StrLenAsync()	O
function	O
with	O
a	O
callback	O
just	O
to	O
handle	O
the	O
ultra	O
long	O
process	O
for	O
searching	O
for	O
the	O
NULL	O
in	O
the	O
40TB	O
string	O
.	O

Sound	O
stupid	O
?	O

Yea	O
,	O
well	O
strlen()	O
returns	O
a	O
64-bit	O
integer	O
!	O

Of	O
course	O
,	O
the	O
proposed	O
StrLenAsync()	O
function	O
is	O
a	O
joke	O
.	O

Well	O
,	O
1)	O
size_t	O
is	O
a	O
typedef	O
and	O
varies	O
with	O
architectures	O
and	O
2)	O
Would	O
n't	O
it	O
make	O
sense	O
to	O
have	O
the	O
largest	O
integer	O
as	O
a	O
return	O
value	O
?	O

Why	O
32	O
bits	O
?	O

Why	O
not	O
16	O
?	O

It	O
's	O
64	O
on	O
your	O
machine	O
because	O
that	O
's	O
the	O
max	O
string	O
length	O
possible	O
.	O

It	O
looks	O
like	O
,	O
when	O
compiling	O
for	O
a	O
64-bit	O
target	O
,	O
size_t	O
is	O
defined	O
as	O
64-bit	O
.	O

This	O
makes	O
sense	O
,	O
since	O
size_t	O
is	O
used	O
for	O
sizes	O
of	O
all	O
kinds	O
of	O
objects	O
,	O
not	O
just	O
strings	O
.	O

I	O
am	O
looking	O
for	O
pupil	O
detection	O
from	O
image	O
using	O
pythonwith	B-Skill
opencvpackage	B-Skill
.	O

my	O

)	O

unable	O

pupil	O

accurately	O
in	O
(	O
b	O
)	O
part	O
of	O
image	O
.	O

In	O
GNU	B-Skill
EMACS	B-Skill
24.3	O
,	O
I	O
use	O

to	O

.	O

I	O

.	O

Is	O
it	O
possible	O
to	O
make	O
certain	O
files	O

or	O
persistent	O
in	O
the	O
list	B-Skill
?	O

.	O

most	O

.	O

can	O

about	O

http://www.emacswiki.org/emacs/BookMarks	O

but	O
in	O
a	O

:	O
C-x	O
r	O
m	O
bookmarks	O
the	O
currently	O
open	O
file	O
(	O
works	O
on	O
dired	B-Skill
buffers	B-Skill
too	O
)	O
.	O

C-x	O
r	O
b	O
loads	O
the	O
bookmarked	O
file	O
with	O
word	O
completion	O
.	O

Set	O
the	O
length	O
of	O
the	O
recent	O
files	O
list	B-Skill
to	O
a	O
high	O
number	O
.	O

example	O
:	O

way	O
the	O
makefiles	O
wo	O

drop	O
out	O
from	O
the	O

if	O

.	O

.	O

ways	O
to	O

that	O
:	O
http://www.emacswiki.org/emacs-es/RecentFiles	O

I	O
am	O
running	O
a	O
Ubuntu	B-Skill
16.04	O
and	O
want	O
to	O
install	O
Composer	B-Skill
.	O

I	O
have	O
2	O
options	O
at	O
least	O
:	O

Through	O
Composer.org	O
site	O
recommendations	O
command	O
line->	O
php	O
-r	O
"	O
copy('https://getcomposer	O
.org/installer	O
'	O
,	O
'	O
composer-setup.php	O
'	O
)	O
;	O
"	O
..	O
.	O

Trough	O
apt	O
->	O
atp	O
install	O
composer	O
,	O
as	O
you	O
can	O
see	O
below	O
:	O

So	O
,	O
is	O
there	O
any	O
constraint	O
to	O
install	O
trough	O
process	O
2	O
?	O

If	O
you	O
install	O
through	O
the	O
package	B-Skill
manager	I-Skill
,	O
you	O
're	O
going	O
to	O
get	O
an	O
older	O
version	O
.	O

Whether	O
or	O
not	O
that	O
matters	O
is	O
up	O
to	O
you	O
.	O

There	O
are	O
benefits	O
to	O
installing	O
everything	O
through	O
the	O
package	B-Skill
manager	I-Skill
;	O
namely	O
,	O
it	O
becomes	O
easy	O
to	O
keep	O
your	O
entire	O
system	O
up-to-date	O
(	O
by	O
Ubuntu	B-Skill
's	O
definition	O
of	O
up-to-date	O
)	O
.	O

There	O
are	O
also	O
obvious	O
benefits	O
to	O
following	O
a	O
given	O
piece	O
of	O
software	O
's	O
instructions	O
.	O

Personally	O
,	O
if	O
I	O
were	O
sharing	O
code	O
with	O
other	O
developers	O
who	O
use	O
composer	B-Skill
,	O
I	O
'd	O
install	O
composer	B-Skill
through	O
the	O
'	O
recommended	O
'	O
way	O
and	O
try	O
to	O
keep	O
it	O
up	O
to	O
date	O
by	O
checking	O
periodically	O
for	O
new	O
versions	O
on	O
the	O

AS	O

said	O
the	O
awaits	O
make	O
your	O
code	O
execute	O
in	O
a	O
serial	O
fashion	O
.	O

That	O
is	O
once	O
execution	O
reaches	O
the	O
first	O
await	O
,	O
execution	O
is	O
effectively	O
"	O
paused	O
"	O
and	O
will	O
not	O
resume	O
until	O
that	O
Task	O
is	O
complete	O
.	O

You	O
can	O

this	O

not	O

the	O
Task	O

just	O
add	O
it	O
to	O
a	O

of	O
tasks	O
to	O
keep	O
track	O
of	O
.	O

.	O

a	O

will	O

.	O

if	O

.	O

Your	O

method	O
then	O
becomes	O
.	O

'	O

@media	O
MIN-width	O
:	O

Min-width	O
media	O
queries	O
are	O
very	O
easy	O
,	O
to	O
use	O
,	O
and	O
are	O
not	O
too	O
different	O
from	O
using	O
MAX	O
media	O
queries	O
.	O

Here	O
is	O
an	O
example	O
using	O
your	O
code	O
:	O

It	O
is	O
important	O
to	O
still	O
use	O
max-width	O
to	O
create	O
limits	O
for	O
the	O
style	O
of	O
objects	O
on	O
certain	O
screens	O
.	O

Using	O
min-width	O
can	O
be	O
especially	O
useful	O
if	O
you	O
want	O
certain	O
styles	O
to	O
apply	O
to	O
a	O
smaller	O
object	O
and	O
then	O
have	O
that	O
same	O
style	O
apply	O
to	O
a	O
larger	O
object	O
.	O

This	O
way	O
you	O
can	O
keep	O
the	O
styles	O
for	O
that	O
minimum	O
size	O
but	O
also	O
add	O
on	O
extra	O
styles	O
to	O
the	O
larger	O
object	O
with	O
out	O
effecting	O
the	O
smaller	O
one	O
.	O

For	O
example	O
:	O

In	O
the	O
above	O
example	O
,	O
the	O
styles	O
from	O
screens	O
with	O
a	O
size	O
of	O
over	O
740px	O
will	O
already	O
be	O
applied	O
to	O
any	O
screens	O
with	O
a	O
size	O
of	O
over	O
900px	O
.	O

From	O
there	O
you	O
can	O
adjust	O
your	O
styles	O
as	O
you	O
like	O
,	O
reducing	O
the	O
amount	O
of	O
code	O
needed	O
to	O
produce	O
the	O
page	O
.	O

Other	O
Things	O
:	O

-When	O
it	O
comes	O
to	O
actual	O
elements	O
on	O
the	O
screen	O
(	O
excluding	O
min/max	O
-sizes	O
with	O
@media	O
)	O
it	O
can	O
always	O
be	O
helpful	O
to	O
use	O
percentages	O
,	O
because	O
that	O
way	O
items	O
can	O
be	O
auto	O
re-sized	O
according	O
to	O
the	O
screen	O
size	O
.	O

-Here	O
is	O
a	O
great	O
website	O
that	O
will	O
help	O
you	O
on	O
your	O
endeavours	O
with	O
media	O
queries	O
:	O
http://css-tricks.com/snippets/css/media-queries-for-standard-devices/	O

It	O
totally	O
depends	O
on	O
the	O
rest	O
of	O
your	O
site	O
.	O

Some	O
sites	O
can	O
be	O
displayed	O
well	O
at	O
the	O
width	O
of	O
400px	O
while	O
some	O
others	O
need	O
to	O
set	O
a	O
minumum	O
because	O
it	O
's	O
too	O
small	O
to	O
render	O
the	O
document	O
objects	O
in	O
a	O
clean	O
manner	O
.	O

Very	O
often	O
you	O
will	O
not	O
even	O
need	O
to	O
use	O
min-width	O
or	O
max-width	O
when	O
optimizing	O
for	O
mobile	O
,	O
there	O
are	O
far	O
more	O
better	O
practices	O
.	O

Here	O
are	O
some	O
of	O
them	O
:	O

Use	O
Em	O
over	O
Px	O
It	O
is	O
always	O
better	O
to	O
set	O
font-size	O
and	O
other	O
sizes	O
in	O
units	O
of	O
"	O
em	O
"	O
rather	O
than	O
in	O
"	O
px	O
"	O
.	O

This	O
is	O
because	O
a	O
pixel	O
is	O
extremely	O
small	O
on	O
a	O
cell	O
phone	O
,	O
whereas	O
em	O
units	O
proportionally	O
adjusts	O
the	O
object	O
to	O
a	O
size	O
that	O
fits	O
the	O
screen	O
.	O

Use	O
Percentages	O
You	O
'll	O
find	O
that	O
using	O
percentages	O
are	O
far	O
more	O
friendly	O
than	O
,	O
for	O
instance	O
,	O
specifying	O
the	O
width	O
or	O
height	O
of	O
an	O
element	O
in	O
pixels	O
or	O
em	O
.	O

If	O
you	O
use	O
percentages	O
,	O
your	O
content	O
will	O
always	O
adjust	O
well	O
in	O
for	O
skinny	O
displays	O
.	O

Avoid	O
Absolutely	O
Positioned	O
Elements	O
Having	O
elements	O
positioned	O
absolutely	O
can	O
be	O
more	O
difficuly	O
to	O
handle	O
on	O
small	O
displays	O
.	O

It	O
simply	O
can	O
,	O
as	O
the	O
absolute	O
elements	O
may	O
get	O
too	O
near	O
to	O
the	O
relatively	O
positioned	O
elements	O
.	O

Use	O
relative	O
positioning	O
as	O
much	O
as	O
possible	O
for	O
a	O
clean	O
site	O
.	O

I	O
am	O
learning	O
python	B-Skill
unittest	B-Skill
.	O

I	O
would	O
like	O
to	O
ask	O
what	O
the	O
'	O
test_code	O
'	O
in	O
the	O
following	O
code	O
is	O
.	O

Is	O
it	O
the	O
argument	O
of	O
'	O
-m	O
'	O
option	O
or	O
one	O
of	O
unittest	B-Skill
?	O

I	O
would	O
like	O
to	O
know	O
how	O
the	O
unittest	B-Skill
works	O
.	O

Thank	O
you	O
very	O
much	O

Using	O
unittest	B-Skill
module	O
you	O
can	O
run	O
tests	O
from	O
modules	O
in	O
command	O
line	O
.	O

While	O
