?	O

UPDATE	O
:	O

Some	O
additional	O
details	O
about	O
question	O

can	O
I	O
make	O
request	O
to	O
http	O
trigger	O
by	O
timer	O
triggred	O
why	O
because	O
my	O
durable	O
function	O
has	O
long	O
running	O
process	O
so	O
if	O
invoke	O
orchestration	O
function	O
in	O
timer	O
trigger	O
itself	O
so	O

might	O
be	O

of	O
timer	O
triggered	O
timeout	O
so	O
that	O
why	O
I	O
am	O

to	O
follow	O
this	O
approach.Is	O

possible	O
to	O
invoke	O
by	O
above	O
code	O
?	O

This	O
is	O
general	O
Azure	B-Skill
Functions	I-Skill
behavior	O
.	O

The	O
reason	O
GET	O
does	O
n't	O
work	O
is	O
because	O
the	O
function	O
in	O
the	O
sample	O
is	O
only	O
configured	O
to	O
work	O
with	O
POST	O
.	O

See	O
the	O
[	O
HttpTrigger	O
]	O
attribute	O
in	O
the	O
function	O
signature	O
:	O

If	O
you	O
want	O
to	O
support	O
GET	O
,	O
then	O
change	O
the	O
methods	O
parameter	O
accordingly	O
:	O

Note	O
that	O
Visual	B-Skill
Studio	I-Skill
seems	O
to	O
have	O
a	O
caching	O
bug	O
where	O
making	O
changes	O
to	O
route	O
information	O
is	O
not	O
properly	O
saved	O
when	O
debugging	O
locally	O
.	O

I	O
opened	O
a	O
GitHub	O
issue	O
to	O
track	O
that	O
here	O
:	O
https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Functions/issues/552	O

For	O
more	O
information	O
on	O
HTTP	O
triggers	O
,	O
see	O
this	O
documentation	O
:	O
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-functions/functions-bindings-http-webhook	O

If	O
you	O
want	O
to	O
trigger	O
a	O
Durable	B-Skill
Function	I-Skill
using	O
a	O
timer	O
trigger	O
,	O
then	O
just	O
change	O
the	O

type	O
.	O

For	O
example	O
:	O

For	O
more	O
information	O
on	O

triggers	O
,	O
see	O
this	O
documentation	O
:	O
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-functions/functions-bindings-timer	O

Because	O
you	O
specified	O
your	O
function	O
to	O
be	O
triggered	O
on	O
POST	O
only	O
:	O

To	O
enable	O
GET	O
,	O
add	O
get	O
to	O
methods	O
parameter	O
.	O

You	O
can	O
define	O
timer-triggered	O
function	O
with	O

input	O

similar	O
to	O
your	O

function	O
.	O

declaration	O
:	O

:	O

)	O
:	O

?	O

in	O

switch	O

I	O

in	O

format	O

to	O

different	O

like	O

i	O

group	O

.Is	O

but	O

other	O

can	O
group	O
by	O
different	O
set	B-Skill
.	O

Thanks	O
.	O

You	O
can	O
use	O
the	O
following	O
query	O
:	O

I	O
make	O
the	O
assumption	O
that	O
id	O
field	O
defines	O
precedence	O
for	O
balance	O
,	O
i.e	O
.	O
the	O
balance	O
with	O

related	O
id	O
value	O
comes	O
first	O
.	O

I	O
'm	O
looking	O
for	O
a	O
simple	O
syntax	O
to	O
allow	O
me	O
to	O
create	O
a	O
new	O
object	O
with	O
one	O
property	O
and	O
set	O
the	O
value	O
of	O
that	O
property	O
.	O

Here	O
's	O
an	O
example	O
.	O

I	O
'd	O
love	O
to	O
be	O
able	O
to	O
do	O
something	O
all	O
on	O
one	O
line	O
.	O

Should	O
log	O
:	O

I	O
thought	O
I	O
saw	O
once	O
that	O
this	O
was	O
going	O
to	O
be	O
possible	O
in	O
the	O
es-spec	O
but	O
it	O
does	O
n't	O
work	O
with	O
the	O
babel-2015	B-Skill
preset	O
.	O

You	O
will	O
need	O
to	O
use	O
computed	O
property	O
names	O
.	O

I	O
have	O

:	O

which	O
releases	O
all	O
of	O

?	O

I	O
ask	O
because	O
of	O
memory	O
management	O
issues	O
.	O

Thank	O
you	O
.	O

You	O
need	O
to	O

a	O

and	O

resources	O

you	O
own	O
.	O

http://developer.apple.com/mac/library/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/MemoryMgmt/Articles/mmObjectOwnership.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/20000043-SW4	O

Important	O
note	O
:	O
you	O
never	O
call	O
a	O
dealloc	O
method	O
on	O
an	O
object	O
,	O

invoked	O
automatically	O
by	O
the	O
runtime	O
when	O

to	O
clean	O
up	O
.	O

I	O
had	O
the	O
same	O
issue	O
as	O
Zigglzworth	O
and	O
it	O
was	O
the	O
position	O
of	O
the	O
[	O
super	O
dealloc	O
]	O
call	O
.	O

I	O
had	O
it	O
at	O
the	O
start	O
of	O
my	O
-(void)dealloc	O
method	O
and	O
it	O
was	O
causing	O
a	O
crash	O
every	O
time	O
.	O

Moved	O
[	O
super	O
dealloc	O
]	O
to	O
the	O
end	O
of	O
the	O
method	O
after	O
the	O
variable	O
release	O
statements	O
and	O
now	O
it	O
works	O
just	O
fine	O
.	O

There	O
are	O
many	O
optimization	O
problems	O
that	O
are	O
known	O
to	O
be	O
NP-hard	O
,	O
such	O
as	O
the	O
traveling	O
salesman	O
problem	O
,	O
MAX-SAT	O
,	O
or	O
finding	O
the	O
minimum	O
chromatic	O
number	O
of	O
a	O
graph	B-Skill
.	O

Given	O
a	O
problem	O
of	O
this	O
sort	O
,	O
I	O
'm	O
curious	O
about	O
the	O
complexity	O
of	O
the	O
following	O
problem	O
:	O

Intuitively	O
,	O
it	O
seems	O
like	O
this	O
might	O
be	O
co-NP	O
hard	O
,	O
since	O
it	O
's	O
easy	O
to	O
refute	O
an	O
answer	O
to	O
an	O
optimization	O
problem	O
by	O
guessing	O
a	O
better	O
solution	O
and	O
using	O
it	O
as	O
a	O
witness	O
,	O
but	O
I	O
have	O
no	O
idea	O
how	O
to	O
show	O
this	O
.	O

In	O
fact	O
,	O
I	O
do	O
n't	O
really	O
know	O
how	O
to	O
reason	O
about	O
the	O
complexity	O
of	O
this	O
problem	O
.	O

Does	O
anyone	O
know	O
of	O
any	O
good	O
lower	O
bounds	O
on	O
the	O
complexity	O
of	O
this	O
decision	O
problem	O
?	O

Knowing	O
whether	O
this	O
was	O
co-NP	O
hard	O
,	O
PSPACE-hard	O
,	O
etc	O
.	O
would	O
be	O
really	O
interesting	O
.	O

The	O
term	O
'	O
NP-hard	O
optimization	O
problem	O
'	O
seems	O
a	O
bit	O
too	O
broad	O
to	O
let	O
a	O
satisfying	O
answer	O
be	O
found	O
.	O

For	O
instance	O
,	O
I	O
ca	O
n't	O
see	O
what	O
precludes	O
decision	O
problems	O
from	O
being	O
considered	O
NP-hard	O
optimization	O
problems	O
if	O
you	O
consider	O
,	O
say	O
,	O
the	O
MAX-CNF-SAT	O
problem	O
with	O
the	O
solutions	O
being	O
scored	O
as	O
floor(k/N)	O
,	O
where	O
k	O
is	O
the	O
number	O
of	O
satisfied	O
clauses	O
and	O
N	O
is	O
the	O
total	O
number	O
of	O
clauses	O
in	O
the	O
instance	O
(	O
which	O
is	O
clearly	O
computable	O
in	O
polynomial	O
time	O
)	O
,	O
then	O
any	O
valuation	O
which	O
yields	O
a	O
1	O
in	O
this	O
formula	O
will	O
have	O
to	O
satisfy	O
the	O
whole	O
formula	O
.	O

So	O
let	O
's	O
assume	O
that	O
we	O
are	O
maximizing	O
floor(k/N)	O
and	O
call	O
this	O
the	O
FLOOR-CNF-SAT	O
optimization	O
problem	O
:	O
)	O

This	O
implies	O
you	O
can	O
reduce	O
TAUTOLOGY	O
to	O
said	O
optimization	O
problem	O
negate	O
the	O
input	O
and	O
add	O
any	O
solution	O
as	O
S	O
.	O
You	O
can	O
even	O
add	O
a	O
dummy	O
variable	O
to	O
make	O
sure	O
the	O
initial	O
solution	O
is	O
gets	O
a	O
0	O
in	O
the	O
FLOOR-CNF-SAT	O
problem	O
.	O

Negation	O
is	O
polynomial	O
in	O
time	O
.	O

Then	O
if	O
a	O
solver	O
for	O
the	O
proposed	O
problem	O
deems	O
S	O
to	O
not	O
be	O
optimal	O
,	O
there	O
must	O
clearly	O
be	O
a	O
valuation	O
which	O
yields	O
a	O
1	O
according	O
to	O
our	O
crafted	O
function	O
and	O
thus	O
satisfies	O
the	O
whole	O
formula	O
in	O
turn	O
providing	O
a	O
valuation	O
that	O
does	O
not	O
satisfy	O
the	O
original	O
input	O
to	O
TAUTOLOGY	O
.	O

By	O
cheating	O
slightly	O
(	O
using	O
an	O
artificially	O
crafted	O
optimization	O
problem	O
)	O
we	O
have	O
established	O
the	O
'	O
is	O
optimal	O
'	O
problem	O
as	O
co-NP-complete	O
,	O
since	O
TAUTOLOGY	O
is	O
easily	O
shown	O
to	O
be	O
co-NP-complete	O
.	O

By	O
your	O
own	O
argument	O
the	O
'	O
is	O
optimal	O
'	O
decision	O
problem	O
is	O
co-NP-hard	O
,	O
since	O
as	O
a	O
witness	O
you	O
only	O
need	O
a	O
better	O
solution	O
score	O
S	O
,	O
score	O
the	O
witness	O
and	O
compare	O
.	O

I	O
do	O
n't	O
really	O
feel	O
great	O
about	O
this	O
reduction	O
but	O
I	O
ca	O
n't	O
easily	O
improve	O
on	O
the	O
problem	O
class	O
.	O

If	O
you	O
require	O
that	O
there	O
be	O
instances	O
which	O
score	O
arbitrarily	O
high	O
and	O
not	O
just	O
{	O
0	O
,	O
1}	O
,	O
I	O
could	O
just	O
use	O
N	O
*	O
floor(k/N)	O
.	O

An	O
improvement	O
to	O
the	O
class	O
could	O
be	O
to	O
only	O
consider	O
a	O
problem	O
an	O
NP-hard	O
optimization	O
problem	O
if	O
for	O
each	O
K	O
there	O
exists	O
an	O
instance	O
that	O
has	O
at	O
least	O
K	O
solutions	O
which	O
all	O
score	O
differently	O
.	O

I	O
think	O
I	O
can	O
still	O
cheat	O
my	O
way	O
through	O
that	O
:	O

Consider	O
a	O
reduction	O
that	O
adds	O
N	O
dummy	O
variables	O
to	O
the	O
TAUTOLOGY	O
input	O
as	O
follows	O
:	O

where	O
S	O
is	O
the	O
negated	O
input	O
.	O

As	O
an	O
initial	O
valuation	O
I	O
choose	O
d1	O
,	O
..	O
.	O
,	O
dN	O
=	O
false	O
,	O
but	O
as	O
a	O
score	O
I	O
give	O
a	O
function	O
that	O
returns	O
2N	O
1	O
if	O
the	O
first	O
N	O
clauses	O
are	O
all	O
false	O
,	O
otherwise	O
it	O
returns	O
the	O
number	O
of	O
satisfied	O
clauses	O
.	O

Such	O
a	O
function	O
would	O
only	O
return	O
2N	O
if	O
all	O
the	O
clauses	O
were	O
satisfied	O
but	O
could	O
easily	O
have	O
at	O
least	O
N	O
distinct	O
values	O
.	O

I	O
am	O
afraid	O
that	O
without	O
some	O
complicated	O

conditions	O
on	O
the	O
scoring	O
function	O
this	O
is	O
the	O
best	O
we	O
can	O
get	O
,	O
unless	O
you	O
consider	O
the	O
definition	O
of	O
an	O
NP-hard	O
optimization	O
problem	O
to	O
be	O
'	O
a	O
problem	O
for	O
which	O
,	O
given	O
a	O
candidate	O
solution	O
S	O
,	O
we	O
can	O
in	O
polynomial	O
time	O
verify	O
whether	O
S	O
is	O
optimal	O
'	O
,	O
in	O
which	O
case	O
'	O
is-optimal	O
'	O
is	O
clearly	O
P	O
and	O
it	O
's	O
no	O
fun	O
at	O
all:/	O

Because	O
S	O
is	O
a	O
candidate	O
solution	O
;	O
given	O
that	O
there	O
are	O
no	O
other	O
S	O
in	O
which	O
S	O
can	O
be	O
proven	O
to	O
be	O
greedy	O
or	O
less	O
optimal	O
than	O
any	O
other	O
S	O
.	O
It	O
must	O
be	O
that	O
S	O
is	O
at	O
current	O
the	O
MOST	O
optimal	O
solution	O
for	O
the	O
problem	O
.	O

I	O
am	O
new	O
to	O
Pentaho	B-Skill
Kettle	I-Skill
and	O
I	O
am	O
wondering	O
what	O
the	O
Internal.Job.Filename.Directory	O
is	O
?	O

Is	O
it	O
my	O
SPoon.bat	O
folder	O
,	O
or	O
the	O
job/xfrm	O
folder	O
i	O
created	O
?	O

Is	O
there	O
a	O
way	O
I	O
can	O
change	O
it	O
to	O
point	O
to	O
particular	O
folder	O
?	O

I	O
am	O
runnig	O
spoon.bat	O
in	O
Windows	B-Skill
XP	O
.	O

To	O
set	O
value	O
to	O
variable	O
Internal.Job.Filename.Directory	O
,	O
you	O
need	O
to	O
launch	O
Job	O
in	O
this	O

way	O
:	O

Internal.Job.Filename.Directory	O
is	O
only	O
set	O
when	O
you	O
do	O
n't	O
use	O
a	O
repository	O
,	O
and	O
it	O
is	O
set	O
automatically	O
.	O

You	O
cannot	O
set	O
it	O
manually	O
.	O

How	O
not	O
to	O
use	O
an	O
repository	O
?	O

When	O
you	O
start	O
Spoon	B-Skill
,	O
you	O
get	O
a	O
dialog	O
which	O
asks	O
for	O
a	O
repository	O
.	O

Just	O
close	O
this	O
dialog	O
with	O
cancel	O
and	O
you	O
're	O
fine	O
!	O

It	O
took	O
me	O
a	O
while	O
to	O
find	O
this	O
:	O
I	O
was	O
wondering	O
why	O
Internal.Job.Filename.Directory	O
was	O
always	O
empty	O
.	O

The	O
repository	O
was	O
the	O
cause	O
.	O

It	O
's	O
documented	O
here	O
:	O
http://jira.pentaho.com/browse/PDI-7434	O

When	O
the	O
length	O
of	O
characters	O
in	O
json	O
result	O
is	O
large	O
the	O
following	O
exception	O
will	O
be	O
raised	O
:	O

The	O
above	O
exception	O
is	O
a	O
server	O
side	O
exception	O
with	O
500	O
response	O
code	O
so	O
if	O
we	O
put	O
the	O
source	O
code	O
inside	O
a	O
try	O
catch	O
block	O
,	O
the	O
error	O
should	O
be	O
caught	O
in	O
catch	O
block	O
,	O
but	O
try	O
catch	O
does	O
not	O
work	O
for	O
this	O
scenario	O
.	O

You	O
could	O
test	O
this	O
problem	O
by	O
following	O
code	O
,	O
please	O
use	O
it	O
inside	O
an	O
asp.net	B-Skill
mvc	B-Skill
controller	O
:	O

I	O
cannot	O
reproduce	O
the	O
error	O
,	O
but	O
anyway	O
what	O
is	O
happening	O
to	O
you	O
is	O
that	O
the	O
Json	O
method	O
implementation	O
is	O
already	O
catching	O
the	O
exception	O
internally	O
and	O
converting	O
it	O
to	O
full-blown	O
HTTP	O
5xx	O
response	O
.	O

There	O
is	O
no	O
exception	O
coming	O
out	O
from	O
the	O
return	O
Json()	O
call	O
.	O

There	O
is	O
no	O
chance	O
for	O
you	O
to	O
catch	O
the	O
exception	O
because	O
..	O
.	O
what	O
would	O
you	O
do	O
?	O

an	O
HTTP	O
5xx	O
response	O
?	O

That	O
is	O
already	O
done	O
for	O
you	O
by	O

MVC	B-Skill
framework	O
.	O

like	O
this	O
:	O

This	O
is	O
code	O
for	O
a	O
HW	O
question	O
in	O
my	O
Multivariate	O
Analysis	O
Class	O

PROC	B-Skill
PLOT	I-Skill
is	O
currently	O
generating	O
a	O
huge	O
chart	B-Skill
,	O
maybe	O
5-10	O
pages	O
tall	O
,	O
with	O
ridiculous	O
vertical	O
scaling	O
(	O
something	O
like	O

=	O

inch+	O
of	O
computer	O

.	O
)	O

's	O
too	O
big	O
to	O
put	O
in	O
a	O
word	O
document	O
to	O
hand	O
in	O
,	O
and	O
it	O
's	O
not	O
informative	O
as	O
is	O
.	O

My	O
question	O
is	O
why	O
is	O
my	O
SAS	B-Skill
doing	O
this	O
,	O
and	O
can	O
I	O
fix	O
it	O
?	O

I	O
'd	O
love	O
it	O
to	O
be	O
scaled	O
down	O
to	O
a	O
5	O
"	O
x	O
5	O
"	O
or	O
something	O
like	O
that	O
...	O
can	O
I	O
do	O
this	O
?	O

(	O
I	O
've	O
a	O
working	O
knowledge	O
of	O
SAS	B-Skill
,	O
but	O
I	O
'm	O
far	O
from	O
skilled	O
at	O
it	O
.	O
)	O

Try	O
using	O
ods	O
graphics	O
and	O
PROC	O
SGPLOT	O
.	O

I	O
wanted	O
to	O
track	O
my	O
models	O
and	O
their	O
CRUD	B-Skill
operations	O
through	O
handling	O
post_save	O
,	O
delete	O
and	O
init	O
signals	O
,	O
and	O
then	O
save	O
entry	O
to	O
the	O
Database	O
about	O
this	O
operation	O
handled	O
.	O

Then	O
the	O
funny	O
thing	O
,	O
it	O
is	O
a	O
recursion	O
of	O
saves	O
..	O
.	O

I	O
created	O
model	O
CRUD_Storage	O
,	O
i	O
want	O
to	O
prevent	O
it	O
sending	O
signals	O
like	O
pre(post)init	O
,	O
delete	O
,	O
save	O
.	O

Here	O
is	O
a	O
DRY	O
way	O
of	O
dismissing	O
signals	O
.	O

If	O
you	O
want	O
to	O
dismiss	O
a	O
signal	O
to	O
avoid	O
recursion	O
,	O
a	O
simple	O
way	O
to	O
go	O
is	O
to	O
set	O
an	O
attribute	O
on	O
the	O
current	O
instance	O
to	O
prevent	O
upcoming	O
signals	O
firing	O
.	O

This	O
can	O
be	O
done	O
using	O
a	O
simple	O
decorator	O
that	O
checks	O
if	O
the	O
given	O
instance	O
has	O
the	O
'	O
skip_signal	O
'	O
attribute	O
,	O
and	O
if	O
so	O
prevents	O
the	O
method	O
from	O
being	O
called	O
:	O

We	O
can	O
now	O
use	O
it	O
this	O
way	O
:	O

Hope	O
This	O
helps	O
.	O

I	O
do	O
n't	O
think	O
you	O
can	O
prevent	O
Django	B-Skill
from	O
sending	O
those	O
signals	O
.	O

However	O
,	O
you	O
can	O
adapt	O
your	O
handler	O
to	O
not	O
log	O
saves	O
for	O
your	O
CRUD_Storage	O
model	O
.	O

I	O
am	O
working	O
on	O
an	O
internal	O
helpdesk	O
.	O

Emails	O
address	O
to	O
the	O
helpdesk	O
appear	O
in	O
a	O
Notes	O
View	O
,	O
and	O
I	O
can	O
open	O
the	O
document	O
in	O
XPages	B-Skill
and	O
see	O
the	O
text	O
.	O

But	O
it	O
wo	O
n't	O
show	O
any	O
inserted	O
images	O
within	O
the	O
text	O
.	O

I	O
can	O
list	O
the	O
attachments	O
as	O
external	O
links	O
(	O
courtesy	O
of	O
http://techdriveactive.blogspot.co.uk/2012/11/open-attachments-in-xpage-in-client.html	O
)	O
but	O
I	O
ca	O
n't	O
seem	O
to	O
get	O
a	O
handle	O
on	O
the	O
images	O
.	O

Any	O
ideas	O
?	O
?	O

To	O
you	O
HelpDeskOpenDoc.xsp	O
XPage	B-Skill
add	O
a	O
Rich	O
Text	O
control	O
and	O
bind	O
it	O
to	O
the	O
Rich	O
Text	O
Field	O
with	O
the	O
images	O
and	O
other	O
rich	O
content	O
..	O
.	O

One	O
way	O
around	O
that	O
challenge	O
is	O
to	O
use	O
a	O
Dojo	O
ContentPane	O
.	O

It	O
has	O
a	O
href	O
attribute	O
that	O
can	O
point	O
to	O

I	O

.	O

.	O

for	O

.	O

?	O

EDIT	O
:	O
My	O
final	O
solution	O
was	O
to	O
make	O
an	O
object	O
from	O
the	O
stdClass	O
and	O
add	O
the	O
variables	O
I	O
needed	O
as	O
attributes	O
to	O
the	O
object	O
.	O

putting	O
a	O
GET	O
request	O
in	O
the	O
link	O
to	O
the	O
CSS	O
file	O
which	O
was	O
the	O
Base64	O
of	O
the	O
JSON	O
string	O
of	O
the	O
object	O
.	O

The	O
problem	O
is	O
that	O
you	O
are	O
linking	O
to	O
that	O
styles.css.php	O
from	O
inside	O
the	O
rendered	O
html	B-Skill
.	O

This	O
means	O
that	O
page	O
will	O
be	O
fetched	O
in	O
a	O
separate	O
request	O
(	O
as	O
you	O
can	O
se	O
when	O
you	O
inspect	O
the	O
page	O
)	O
.	O

This	O
request	O
never	O
passes	O
trough	O
your	O
index.php	O
,	O
and	O
so	O
the	O
$name	O
variable	O
will	O
not	O
be	O
set	O
.	O

I	O
would	O
advise	O
you	O
to	O
include	O
the	O
css	B-Skill
in	O
the	O
rendered	O
HTML	B-Skill
inside	O
a	O
style	O
block	O
.	O

It	O
should	O
be	O
as	O
easy	O
as	O
changing	O
your	O
import.php	O
to	O
this	O
:	O

This	O
also	O
has	O
the	O
added	O
benefit	O
of	O
reducing	O
the	O
number	O
of	O
requests	O
the	O
browser	B-Skill
has	O
to	O
make	O
,	O
and	O
should	O
therefore	O
speed	O
up	O
the	O
page	O
.	O

This	O
is	O
btw	O
not	O
a	O
very	O
standard	O
method	O
of	O
using	O
css	B-Skill
.	O

I	O
believe	O
it	O
would	O
be	O
better	O
to	O
add	O
some	O
sort	O
of	O
id	O
(	O
or	O
data	O
attribute	O
)	O
on	O
your	O
body	O
tag	O
that	O
indicates	O
the	O
name	O
of	O
the	O
page	O
you	O
are	O
on	O
.	O

In	O
the	O
css	O
file	O
(	O
that	O
does	O
not	O
run	O
trough	O
php	B-Skill
,	O
just	O
a	O
standard	O
css	O
file	O
)	O
,	O
you	O
could	O
then	O
do	O
something	O
like	O
this	O
:	O

The	O
<link>	O
tag	O
makes	O
an	O
HTTP	O
request	O
for	O
a	O
file	O
totally	O
independent	O
of	O
the	O
PHP	B-Skill
pages	O
that	O
are	O
including	O
each	O
other	O
,	O
so	O
$name	O
is	O
not	O
available	O
in	O
styles.css.php	O
.	O

To	O
do	O
it	O
this	O
way	O
you	O
need	O
to	O
link	O
the	O
style	O
sheet	O
something	O
like	O
this	O
to	O
pass	O
$name	O
as	O
a	O
get	O
variable	O
:	O

Then	O
in	O
the	O
style	O
sheet	O
styles.css.php	O
use	O
$_GET['name']	O
:	O

I	O
have	O
a	O
scenario	O
where	O
my	O
application	O
opens	O
a	O
document	O
in	O
google	B-Skill
drive	I-Skill
and	O
allows	O
user	O
to	O
edit	O
.	O

Now	O
if	O

want	O
multiple	O
users	O
to	O
edit	O
the	O
document	O
,	O
how	O
(	O
what	O
google	O
api-oauth/openconnect/identity	O
federation/sign	O
in	O
)	O
should	O
I	O
use	O
to	O
authenticate	O
users	O
and	O
get	O
their	O
profile	O
info	O
.	O

So	O
that	O

can	O

the	O
same	O
document	O
and	O
edit	O
it	O
.	O

Currently	O
,	O
I	O
am	O
authenticating	O
using	O
service	O
account	O
and	O
allowing	O
anonymous	O
access	O
.	O

can	O

?	O

API	O

?	O

guide	O
!	O

You	O
can	O
actually	O
use	O
Google	B-Skill
Drive	I-Skill

API	I-Skill
which	O
uses	O
these	O
authorization	O
protocols	O
:	O

OAuth	B-Skill
2.0	O
to	O
authorize	O
requests	O
,	O
or	O

if	O
your	O
application	O
uses	O
Google	O

some	O
aspects	O
of	O
authorization	O
are	O
handled	O
for	O
you	O
.	O

You	O
can	O
follow	O
this	O
general	O
authorization	O
process	O
for	O
all	O
application	O
types	O
as	O
given	O

2.0	O

.	O

I	O
have	O
a	O

with	O

following	O
data	O

The	O
above	O

of	O

between	O

.	O

I	O

the	O
following	O
format	O

on	O
how	O

can	O

.	O

use	O
group	O

conditional	O

Edit	O
:	O

You	O
could	O
also	O
directly	O
fetch	O
the	O
source	O
and	O
destination	O
station	O
by	O

and	O

function	O

Note	O
:	O

above	O
is	O
tested	O
based	O
on	O
data	O
provided	O
in	O
Q	O

Try	O
the	O
following	O

Or	O
you	O
can	O
use	O
window	O
functions	O
FIRST_VALUE	O
and	O
LAST_VALUE	O
if	O
your	O

of	O

supports	O

If	O
ID	O
are	O
inconsistent	O
then	O

can	O
use	O
a	O
recursive	O
CTE	O

a	O

from	O

queries	B-Skill

.	O

It	O
is	O
not	O
working	O
because	O
you	O
have	O

(	O

.	O

Usage	O
info	O
from	O

This	O
should	O
do	O
the	O
trick	O
:	O

Are	O
there	O
an	O
efficient	O
algorithm	O
to	O
search	O
and	O
dump	O
all	O
common	O
substrings	O
(	O
which	O
length	O
is	O
3	O
or	O
longer	O
)	O
between	O
2	O
strings	O
?	O

Example	O
input	O
:	O

Example	O
output	O
:	O

In	O
the	O
example	O
,	O
"	O
-D	O
"	O
,	O
"	O
-M	O
"	O
is	O
also	O
a	O
common	O
substring	O
but	O
is	O
not	O
required	O
,	O
because	O

is	O
only	O
2	O
.	O

(	O
There	O
might	O
be	O
some	O
missing	O
outputs	O
in	O
example	O
because	O
there	O
are	O
so	O
many	O
of	O

..	O
.	O
)	O

You	O
can	O
find	O
all	O
common	O
substrings	O
using	O
a	O
data	O
structure	O
called	O
a	O
Generalized	B-Skill
suffix	I-Skill
tree	I-Skill

Libstree	B-Skill
contains	O
some	O
example	O
code	O
for	O
finding	O
the	O
longest	O
common	O
substring	O
.	O

That	O
example	O
code	O
can	O
be	O
modified	O
to	O
obtain	O
all	O
common	O
substrings	O
.	O

I	O
need	O
a	O
way	O
to	O
be	O
able	O
to	O
read	O
from	O
a	O
UTF-8	O
encoded	O
file	O
and	O
store	O
data	O
from	O
it	O
into	O
"	O
UTF-8	O
compatible	O
strings	O
"	O
of	O
some	O
sort	O
,	O
in	O
C++	B-Skill
.	O

This	O
data	O
needs	O
to	O
be	O
written	O
back	O
to	O
a	O
UTF-8	O
encoded	O
file	O
later	O
on	O
.	O

There	O
seems	O
to	O
be	O
a	O
lot	O
of	O
advice	O
on	O
google	O
about	O
doing	O
this	O
in	O
Windows	B-Skill
but	O
I	O
cannot	O
find	O
any	O
help	O
for	O
Unix	B-Skill
systems	O
.	O

Thanks	O
for	O
your	O
help	O
!	O

If	O
all	O
you	O
need	O
to	O
do	O
is	O
read	O
and	O
write	O
it	O
then	O
std::string	O
is	O
fine	O
.	O

This	O
works	O
because	O
no	O
multi-character	O
UTF	O
codepoint	O
overlaps	O
with	O
an	O
an	O
ASCII	O
character	O
so	O
the	O
standard	O
processing	O
of	O
text	O
works	O
just	O
fine	O
in	O
relation	O
to	O
end	O
of	O
line	O
sequence	O
and	O
there	O
is	O
no	O
other	O
processing	O
done	O
by	O
the	O
stream	O
.	O

What	O
you	O
read	O
is	O
what	O
you	O
get	O
.	O

Outputting	O
the	O
string	O
does	O
not	O
change	O
any	O
of	O
the	O
codepoints	O
.	O

Now	O
if	O
you	O
need	O
to	O
manipulate	O
the	O
text	O
that	O
is	O
a	O
different	O
question	O
and	O
gets	O
more	O
complex	O
.	O

Usually	O
manipulating	O
UTF-8	O
is	O
way	O
to	O
hard	O
(	O
can	O
be	O
done	O
but	O
not	O
worth	O
it	O
IMO	O
)	O
.	O

When	O
it	O
comes	O
to	O
manipulating	O
the	O
text	O
you	O
want	O
to	O
convert	O
the	O
UTF-8	O
(	O
which	O
is	O
not	O
a	O
fixed	O
width	O
)	O
to	O
an	O
internal	O
fixed	O
width	O
format	O
;	O
(	O
UTF-16	O
or	O
UTF-32	O
are	O
common	O
formats	O
for	O
manipulation	O
and	O
easy	O
to	O
use	O
;	O
(	O
UTF-16	O
windows	B-Skill
,	O
UTF-32	O
for	O
most	O
*	B-Skill
nix	I-Skill
like	O
OS	O
)	O
)	O
.	O

The	O
easiest	O
way	O
to	O
do	O
this	O
is	O
to	O
imbue	O
the	O
stream	O
with	O
a	O
facet	O
that	O
knows	O
the	O
input	O
is	O
in	O
UTF-8	O
and	O
will	O
convert	O
it	O
automatically	O
.	O

There	O
are	O
a	O
couple	O
of	O
these	O
facets	O
floating	O
around	O
in	O
different	O
libraries	O
.	O

But	O
an	O
easy	O
one	O
to	O
find	O
is	O
boost	O
:	O

http://www.boost.org/doc/libs/1_38_0/libs/serialization/doc/codecvt.html	O

Note	O
:	O
It	O
is	O
also	O
in	O
the	O
latest	O
version	O
of	O
boost	B-Skill
1.46	O

The	O
processes	O
is	O
the	O
same	O
for	O
writting	O
UTF-16/32	O
back	O
to	O
a	O
stream	O
and	O
converting	O
it	O
to	O
UTF-8	O

Note	O
.	O

You	O
should	O
imbue	O
the	O
file	O
before	O
it	O
is	O
opened	O
.	O

Different	O
implementations	O
of	O
the	O
stream	O
will	O
react	O
differently	O
if	O
you	O
imbue	O
the	O
stream	O
after	O
it	O
is	O
open	O
.	O

Thus	O
it	O
is	O
best	O
to	O
imbue	O
the	O
stream	O
before	O
opening	O
it	O
.	O

Dinkumware	O
also	O
has	O
a	O
set	O
of	O
conversion	O
facets	O
(	O
not	O
sure	O
if	O
they	O
are	O
free	O
)	O
.	O

http://www.dinkumware.com/manuals/default.aspx?manual=compleat&page=index_cvt.html#Code%20Conversions	O

Note	O
:	O
I	O
prefer	O
to	O
use	O
the	O
terms	O
UTF-X	O
rather	O
than	O
UCS-Y	O
.	O

Though	O
technically	O
there	O
are	O
very	O
minor	O
differences	O
these	O
are	O
inconsequential	O
compared	O
to	O
the	O
confusion	O
you	O
can	O
create	O
by	O
switching	O
between	O
the	O
two	O
terms	O
while	O
talking	O
about	O
the	O
subject	O
.	O

Stick	O
to	O
one	O
unless	O
you	O
need	O
to	O
talk	O
explicitly	O
about	O
a	O
feature	O
(	O
like	O
Surrogate	O
pairs	O
)	O
.	O

This	O
code	O
takes	O
practically	O
no	O
time	O
at	O
all	O
when	O
optimizing	O
with	O
-O3	O

What	O
compiler	B-Skill
optimization	O
is	O
making	O
this	O
code	O
go	O
from	O
0.014	O
seconds	O
with	O
-O0	O
to	O
0.000000	O
with	O
-03	O

The	O
internal	O
large	O
loop	O
has	O
no	O
side	O
effects	O
since	O
you	O
're	O
not	O
using	O
B	O
anywhere	O
,	O
so	O
any	O
decent	O
compiler	B-Skill
with	O
-O3	O
will	O
eliminate	O
it	O
.	O

To	O
avoid	O
that	O
,	O
you	O
could	O
try	O
to	O
summarize	O
the	O
values	O
and	O
print	O
out	O
the	O
outcome	O
at	O
the	O
end	O
.	O

Alternatively	O
,	O
printing	O
some	O
random	O
element	O
from	O
B	O
might	O
make	O
the	O
compiler	B-Skill
suspicious	O
enough	O
to	O
avoid	O
that	O
elimination	O

It	O
is	O
hard	O
to	O
say	O
for	O
sure	O
without	O
checking	O
the	O
generated	O
assembly	O
.	O

In	O
general	O
,	O
there	O
is	O
as-if	O
rule	O
,	O
which	O

It	O
could	O
be	O
,	O
for	O
instance	O
,	O
that	O
since	O
neither	O
A	O
no	O
B	O
are	O
used	O
anywhere	O
,	O
the	O
compiler	B-Skill
just	O
omits	O

as	O
well	O
as	O

I	O
have	O
a	O
problem	O
.	O

.	O

and	O

:	O

Usually	O

of	O

.	O

program	O
.	O

.	O

.	O

;	O

}	O

debug	O

.	O

This	O

as	O
the	O

population_->members_.count()	O

.	O

Here	O

assembly	B-Skill
code	O

of	O

.	O

is	O

.	O

debug	O
:	O

is	O

0xbffff780	O

of	O
0xbffff628	O
.	O

An	O
increment	O
of	O
344	O

This	O
happens	O
always	O
.	O

The	O
increment	O
is	O
344	O
.	O

This	O

.	O

;	O
method	O
as	O

some	O

is	O

.	O

EDIT	O
:	O

You	O
are	O
copying	O
around	O
Population-instances	O
quite	O
a	O
bit	O
:	O
1	O
.	O
you	O
are	O
returning	O
a	O
local	O
copy	O
by	O
value	O
,	O
2	O
.	O
copying	O
again	O
by	O

into	O
another	O

with	O

All	O

to	O

and	O
ownsMembers_	O
is	O
always	O
set	O
true	O

a	O

fishy	O

to	O
debug	O

of	O

its	O

.	O

EDIT	O
:	O
append	O
method	O

This	O
means	O
that	O
the	O
members	O
to	O
not	O
point	O
to	O
the	O
correct	O
Population	O
anymore	O
!	O

The	O
value	O
of	O
Population&	O
is	O

on	O
stack	B-Skill
and	O
gets	O

after	O
the	O
for	O

ends	O
,	O
but	O
the	O

still	O
point	O
to	O
these	O

.	O

Edit	O
:	O
Fix	O

please	O
try	O
this	O
:	O

I	O
've	O
scoured	O
SOF	O
and	O
google	O
for	O
an	O
answer	O
no	O
joy	O

I	O
am	O
able	O
to	O
connect	O
to	O
a	O
database	O
I	O
presume	O
in	O
JavaScript	B-Skill
,	O
I	O
wish	O
to	O
populate	O
the	O
results	O
into	O
a	O
HTML	B-Skill
forms	O
option	O
field	O
.	O
